T08D4144:172b-1: su warnna warnna aa ba d'a nam /
T08D4144:172b-3: gser mdog gi rtogs pa brjod pa /
T08D4144:172b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T08D4144:173a-1: brtan 'od srungs chen po yongs su mya ngan las
T08D4144:173a-2: 'das nas gnas brtan kun dga' bo bdag nyid che
T08D4144:173a-3: ba / gnas brtan sha ra dva ti'i bu dang /
T08D4144:173a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du snying rje chen pos sems shing /
T08D4144:173a-9: tshong 'dus la sogs pa de dang der gdul bya
T08D4144:173a-10: de dang de thabs kyi bye brag de dang de
T08D4144:173a-12: ci tsam na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe gdul bya'i
T08D4144:173a-13: dbang gis sems can bye ba brgya stong dpag tu
T08D4144:173a-14: med pa la dam pa'i chos ston pa'i bdud rtsi'i
T08D4144:173a-15: char 'bebs pas yang dag par tshim par byed cing
T08D4144:173a-16: / yangs pa can gyi gnas aa mra srung ba'i tshal gang na ba na gnas so //
T08D4144:173a-17: yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na /
T08D4144:173a-18: ded dpon nyi ma zhes bya ba /
T08D4144:173a-22: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
T08D4144:173a-23: rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas te /
T08D4144:173a-24: der rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
T08D4144:173a-25: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
T08D4144:173a-26: de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med /
T08D4144:173a-27: de bu med pas bu shin tu 'dod pas yongs
T08D4144:173a-28: su gdungs shing 'dug pa na sum cu rtsa gsum
T08D4144:173a-29: gyi lha'i nang na lha'i bu bsod nams kyi mthu
T08D4144:173a-30: chen po dang ldan pa zhig la 'chi ba'i ltas
T08D4144:173a-31: rnam pa lnga byung bar gyur pa dang /
T08D4144:173a-32: sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten la bltas nas /
T08D4144:173a-33: mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bas mi'i nang du mtshams sbyar bar 'dod ba dang /
T08D4144:173a-34: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de 'chi 'pho ba mthong zhing /
T08D4144:173a-35: sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T08D4144:173a-36: la bltas nas mya ngan las 'da' bar mngon par
T08D4144:173a-37: 'dod pas mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor
T08D4144:173a-39: mthong nas kyang lha'i bu de'i thad du song ste de skad ces smras so //
T08D4144:173a-40: grogs po khyed mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams
T08D4144:173a-41: sbyor bar 'dod na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
T08D4144:173a-42: de na ded dpon nyi ma'i chung ma yod pa'i
T08D4144:173a-43: mngal du nying mtshams sbyor cig / des smras pa
T08D4144:173a-44: / koo shi ka ded dpon de ni dad pa med pa ste /
T08D4144:173a-45: de la ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu dad pa med do //
T08D4144:173b-0: @173b grogs po nying mtshams sbyor cig dang /
T08D4144:173b-1: ji ltar ded dpon de sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon bar dad ba de ltar ngas bya'o //
T08D4144:173b-3: koo shi ka gal te ded dpon chung ma dang
T08D4144:173b-4: bcas par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dkon mchog gsum
T08D4144:173b-5: la skyabs su 'gro na de lta na ni ded
T08D4144:173b-6: dpon de'i chung ma'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyor bar
T08D4144:173b-7: bya'o // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum nas mi snang bar gyur te /
T08D4144:173b-8: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du ded dpon nyi
T08D4144:173b-9: ma'i khyim gyi steng gi khang gi gzhi la gnas
T08D4144:173b-11: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi kha dog gi mthus
T08D4144:173b-12: khyim de thams cad lha'i snang bas snang bar byas
T08D4144:173b-13: so // ded dpon nyi mas lha'i snang ba de
T08D4144:173b-14: mthong zhing bltas nas yang ngo mtshar gyis mig gdangs
T08D4144:173b-15: te phyogs bzhir lta bar bsams pa dang /
T08D4144:173b-16: ci tsam na lha'i dbang po brgya byin mthong nas
T08D4144:173b-17: yang myur ba nyid du de'i rkang pa gnyis la
T08D4144:173b-19: gang khyed bdag gi khang par byon pas khang pa
T08D4144:173b-20: 'di ltar byas pa ni rnyed pa shin tu legs
T08D4144:173b-21: par rnyed do // khyed 'dir byon pa'i dgongs pa
T08D4144:173b-22: gang yin pa gsungs shig / lha'i dbang po brgya
T08D4144:173b-24: ded dpon khyed ni bu med de bu yod par
T08D4144:173b-25: mngon par dga' na chung ma dang bcas par deng
T08D4144:173b-26: nas bzung ste / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dkon
T08D4144:173b-27: mchog gsum la skyabs su song shig / khyod la
T08D4144:173b-29: ded dpon nyi ma dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis smras pa /
T08D4144:173b-30: lha'i dbang po khyod kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa de ltar 'tshal te /
T08D4144:173b-31: bdag chung ma dang bcas par deng nas bzung ste /
T08D4144:173b-32: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi'o //
T08D4144:173b-33: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ded dpon
T08D4144:173b-34: nyi ma chung ma dang bcas pa skyabs su 'gro
T08D4144:173b-35: ba la bkod nas rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang
T08D4144:173b-36: bar gyur te / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas
T08D4144:173b-37: su lha'i bu de'i gzhal yas khang du 'khod par
T08D4144:173b-38: bar gyur te / gyur ro // de nas lha'i
T08D4144:173b-39: dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de la gtam
T08D4144:173b-40: gyi rnam pa rgyas par smras pa dang /
T08D4144:173b-41: ji tsam na lha'i bu de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas nas 'phos te /
T08D4144:173b-42: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong du ded dpon nyi ma'i chung ma'i mngal du zhugs bar gyur to //
T08D4144:173b-43: de gang gi tshe de'i mngal du 'phos pa de
T08D4144:173b-44: nyid kyi tshe ded dpon gyi chung ma'i lus la
T08D4144:173b-45: kha dog shin tu rgyas pa dang /
T08D4144:173b-46: dri yid du 'ong ba byung bar gyur to //
T08D4144:174a-1: rnams la ni thun mong ma yin pa chos rnam pa lnga yod de /
T08D4144:174a-3: skyes pa chags par yang shes shing /
T08D4144:174a-4: ma chags par yang shes pa dang /
T08D4144:174a-5: dus shes shing sa bon shes pa dang /
T08D4144:174a-6: mngal du 'jug pa shes pa dang /
T08D4144:174a-7: gang las mngal du 'jug pa de shes pa dang /
T08D4144:174a-8: khye'ur gyur par shes shing bu mor gyur pa shes te /
T08D4144:174a-9: gal te khye'ur gyur na ni dku g-yas par rten cing gnas la /
T08D4144:174a-10: gal te bu mor gyur na ni dku g-yon par rten cing gnas so //
T08D4144:174a-11: de nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis khyo la smras pa /
T08D4144:174a-12: rje'i sras dgyes pa bskyed du gsol /
T08D4144:174a-13: bdag sems can dang ldan par gyur te /
T08D4144:174a-14: ji nas kyang bdag gi dku g-yas par rten cing gnas pa las na nges par khye'ur 'gyur ro //
T08D4144:174a-15: des de thos pa dang de yang shin tu dga'
T08D4144:174a-16: ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ro stod
T08D4144:174a-17: bteg nas lag pa g-yas pa brkyang ste /
T08D4144:174a-18: ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa /
T08D4144:174a-19: kye ma 'ongs kyang yun ring du mngon par 'dod pa'i bu'i gdong la blta bar 'gyur la /
T08D4144:174a-20: skyes shing byung nas kyang nga'i bya ba byas te /
T08D4144:174a-21: de rigs rgyud phun sum tshogs shing nga'i rigs yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang /
T08D4144:174a-22: bdag cag shi zhing dus byas nas kyang nor nyung du'am mang po sbyin par ni gtong /
T08D4144:174a-23: bsod nams ni byas nas 'di de gnyis gang dang
T08D4144:174a-24: gang du skyes pa'i rjes bzhin du 'gro bar gyur
T08D4144:174a-25: cig ces bdag gi ming gis yon bsngo bar 'gyur
T08D4144:174a-26: ro // 'di ni sems can dang ldan par gyur
T08D4144:174a-27: to snyam du shes nas steng gi khang bzangs kyi
T08D4144:174a-28: gzhi la nyam nga ba med par 'jog ste /
T08D4144:174a-29: de'i mngal yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yid
T08D4144:174a-30: du mi 'ong ba'i sgra cung zad kyang mi thos
T08D4144:174a-31: shing grang ba dang grang ba'i yo byad dang dro
T08D4144:174a-32: ba dang dro ba'i yo byad dang /
T08D4144:174a-33: sman pas bstan pa'i kha zas ha cang kha ba ma yin pa dang /
T08D4144:174a-34: ha cang skyur ba ma yin pa dang /
T08D4144:174a-35: ha cang lan tshva che ba ma yin pa dang /
T08D4144:174a-36: ha cang mngar ba ma yin pa dang /
T08D4144:174a-37: ha cang tsha ba ma yin pa dang /
T08D4144:174a-38: ha cang bska ba ma yin pa ste /
T08D4144:174a-44: bska ba spangs pa'i kha zas kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing do shal dang /
T08D4144:174a-45: se mo dos lus brgyan nas lha'i bu mo dga'
T08D4144:174a-46: ba'i tshal na rgyu ba bzhin du khri'u nas khri'u
T08D4144:174b-0: dang / khri nas @174b khrir rgyu ste /
T08D4144:174b-1: 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab po //
T08D4144:174b-2: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang /
T08D4144:174b-4: blta na sdug pa mdzes pa /
T08D4144:174b-5: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa /
T08D4144:174b-6: gser btso ma'i mdog gi kha dog shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
T08D4144:174b-7: 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid dang mig 'phrog pa /
T08D4144:174b-8: gser gyi mdog can gyi gos kyis lus dkris pa /
T08D4144:174b-9: de'i yan lag thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ba /
T08D4144:174b-10: de'i kha nas autpa la'i dri 'byung ba /
T08D4144:174b-11: de skyes pa tsam gyis khyim der gos kyi char dang /
T08D4144:174b-12: me tog kar ni ka ri'i char bab ste /
T08D4144:174b-13: gos de dag kyang gser gyi mdog can yin no //
T08D4144:174b-14: de nas ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba de dang
T08D4144:174b-15: de'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa rgya chen po mthong
T08D4144:174b-16: ba dang / ded dpon nyi ma'i chung ma dang
T08D4144:174b-17: 'khor rnams shin tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to
T08D4144:174b-18: ba dang / // ded dpon nyi ma sgo'i phyi rol na gnas pa la /
T08D4144:174b-19: ded dpon khyed kyi sras bltam pa tsam gyis dgyes pa skyed cig ces go bar byas pa dang /
T08D4144:174b-20: de dga' ba dang mgu ba dang /
T08D4144:174b-21: rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis khyim du zhugs pa dang /
T08D4144:174b-22: ji tsam na gzhon nu gzugs shin tu bzang ba /
T08D4144:174b-26: nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa /
T08D4144:174b-27: gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bus mdog rgyas pa dang ldan pa /
T08D4144:174b-28: 'gro ba thams cad kyi mig dang yid 'phrog pa /
T08D4144:174b-29: gser gyi mdog can gyi gos kyis lus dkris pa
T08D4144:174b-30: 'di'i yan lag thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri
T08D4144:174b-31: 'byung ba / de'i kha nas autpa la'i dri 'byung ba /
T08D4144:174b-32: de skyes pa tsam gyis ni khyim der gos kyi char dang /
T08D4144:174b-33: me tog kar ni ka ri'i char bab ste /
T08D4144:174b-34: gos de dag kyang gser gyi kha dog can du mthong ngo //
T08D4144:174b-35: mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rab tu dga' ba skyes te /
T08D4144:174b-36: ched du brjod pa dag ched du brjod pa /
T08D4144:174b-37: ae ma'o rnyed pa rnams ni shin tu rnyed de /
T08D4144:174b-38: ae ma'o gang 'di lta bu'i bsod nams kyi mthu
T08D4144:174b-39: chen po dang ldan pa'i bu skyes pa ni bdag
T08D4144:174b-40: gi yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur
T08D4144:174b-41: to zhes dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rab tu
T08D4144:174b-42: dga' ba'i yid kyis gos de rnams dge sbyong dang
T08D4144:174b-45: phongs shing sdug bsngal ba dang /
T08D4144:174b-48: snag gi gnyen mtshams la byin te /
T08D4144:175a-0: gzhon nu de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston @175a * //
T08D4144:175a-1: bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du rgya
T08D4144:175a-2: cher byas nas grogs po dag khye'u 'di'i ming cir
T08D4144:175a-3: gdags zhes ming 'dogs bar byed pa dang /
T08D4144:175a-4: nye du rnams kyis smras pa /
T08D4144:175a-5: gzhan nu 'di gser btso ma'i mdog gis shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan te /
T08D4144:175a-6: de bas na gzhon nu 'di'i ming gser mdog ces gdags par bya'o zhes te /
T08D4144:175a-7: de la gser mdog ces bya ba'i ming btags so //
T08D4144:175a-8: gzhon nu gser mdog ma ma brgyad po bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
T08D4144:175a-9: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
T08D4144:175a-10: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
T08D4144:175a-11: rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te /
T08D4144:175a-12: ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad nas de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /
T08D4144:175a-17: gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis skyed par byed /
T08D4144:175a-18: sring bar byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do //
T08D4144:175a-19: de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe /
T08D4144:175a-26: gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs shing brtag pa brgyad po /
T08D4144:175a-29: rin po che brtag pa dang /
T08D4144:175a-31: glang po che brtag pa dang /
T08D4144:175a-34: gzhon nu ma brtag pa dang /
T08D4144:175a-36: klog pa la mkhas pa dang /
T08D4144:175a-38: de yang bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po dang ldan pa /
T08D4144:175a-40: bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa /
T08D4144:175a-42: bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod pa /
T08D4144:175a-43: skye dgu rnams la mnyes gshin pa ste /
T08D4144:175a-44: de bstan bcos thams cad klog pa dang /
T08D4144:175a-45: de shin tu bsod nams kyi mthu che ba yin
T08D4144:175a-46: pas gos la sogs pa dang nor rnams gang bsams
T08D4144:175a-47: pa dang gang gsol ba de thams cad de bzhin
T08D4144:175a-49: bdag ni 'di ltang bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan no snyam du mi sems so //
T08D4144:175a-50: ded dpon nyi ma 'di snyam du bdag dkon mchog
T08D4144:175a-51: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i drin gyis bu skyes
T08D4144:175a-52: so zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la shin
T08D4144:175b-0: tu yang mngon par dad nas @175b de dus dang
T08D4144:175b-1: dus su bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la bya
T08D4144:175b-3: yang de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i khab kyi
T08D4144:175b-4: grong khyer du ded dpon dri ma med pa zhes
T08D4144:175b-5: bya ba rgya mtsho nas gru grub ste /
T08D4144:175b-6: slar 'ongs nas des bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong
T08D4144:175b-7: nyis brgya lnga bcus bskor ba la bshos drangs te
T08D4144:175b-8: / dge slong re re zhing chos gos gsum gsum phul ba dang /
T08D4144:175b-9: skyes bu dam pa 'di'i rgya mtsho chen por zhugs
T08D4144:175b-10: pa dang ded dpon gyi sgra ni 'bras bu dang
T08D4144:175b-12: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la bya
T08D4144:175b-13: ba byas so zhes bya ba'i grags pas 'jig rten
T08D4144:175b-14: thams cad du khyab par gyur pa dang /
T08D4144:175b-15: ded dpon nyi mas thos pa na 'gran 'dod par gyur te /
T08D4144:175b-16: nga yang rgya mtsho chen por zhugs la gal te
T08D4144:175b-17: de nas gru legs par grub nas bcom ldan 'das
T08D4144:175b-18: la zhus te / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
T08D4144:175b-19: 'dzam bu'i gling na ji snyed cig gnas pa de
T08D4144:175b-20: rnams gcig tu bsdus nas zas bsod pa rnams kyis
T08D4144:175b-21: tshim par byas la dge slong re re zhing rin
T08D4144:175b-22: po che'i chos gos gsum gsum gyis dga' bar bya'o
T08D4144:175b-23: snyam nas de chung ma la gtam de smras pa
T08D4144:175b-24: la zhus te / dang / des smras pa /
T08D4144:175b-25: bdag po khyod kyis yang dag par rtog par 'byor
T08D4144:175b-26: par gyur cing yid la re ba rdzogs par gyur
T08D4144:175b-27: cig / de nas ded dpon nyi mas rgyal po'i
T08D4144:175b-28: khab kyi grong khyer du lan gsum gyi bar du
T08D4144:175b-29: dril bsgrags te / tshong pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so //
T08D4144:175b-30: de rgya mtsho chen po der zhugs pa dang /
T08D4144:175b-31: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
T08D4144:175b-32: de de nyid na gnas pa'i tshe gnas brtan 'od
T08D4144:175b-33: srungs chen po yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das
T08D4144:175b-34: so // ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na gzhon
T08D4144:175b-35: nu gser mdog 'od ma'i tshal du song ba dang
T08D4144:175b-36: so // / de nas dge slong zhig mi rtag
T08D4144:175b-37: pa nyid dang rab tu ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad
T08D4144:175b-39: tshe 'di nyid dang mtshan mo dang //
T08D4144:175b-40: 'gro ba dang ni ldog pa dang //
T08D4144:175b-41: chu klung chen po'i rgyun bzhin du //
T08D4144:175b-43: chu chung gi ni nya lta bur //
T08D4144:175b-44: gang zhig nyin mtshan 'da' ba yi //
T08D4144:175b-45: tshe ni shin tu thung gyur na //
T08D4144:175b-46: de la bya dgar ci zhig yod //
T08D4144:175b-47: gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pas na //
T08D4144:175b-48: lus 'di yong sus rtas pa dang //
T08D4144:176a-3: / kye ma lus 'di mi thogs par //
T08D4144:176a-4: stong zhing rnam shes dang bral nas //
T08D4144:176a-5: dur khrod bor ba'i mgal dum ltar //
T08D4144:176a-7: rgyun du nad kyis mngon gdungs shing //
T08D4144:176a-8: rtag tu mi gtsang 'dzag pa dang //
T08D4144:176a-10: lus 'di dor na cir mi rung //
T08D4144:176a-11: myur du 'jig cing rna ba dang //
T08D4144:176a-12: rnag dang ldan ba'i lus 'di yis //
T08D4144:176a-13: grub dang bde ba bla med dang //
T08D4144:176a-14: zhing mchog don du gnyer bar gyis //
T08D4144:176a-15: tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos pa dang //
T08D4144:176a-16: gzhon nu gser mdog 'khor ba las yongs su skyo zhing /
T08D4144:176a-17: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan ma
T08D4144:176a-18: thong bas dge slong de la phyag byas te dris

T08D4144:183b-20: kyi hud yid la re ba brgyas thob pa /

T08D4144:183b-25: mdog shin tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa /

T08D4144:183b-27: kyi hud skye bo thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba /
T08D4144:183b-28: kyi hud mi kun dga' bar byed pa /

T08D4144:183b-33: kyi hud snying rje can chos 'dod pa /
T08D4144:183b-34: sems can la mnyes gshin pa /
T08D4144:183b-35: kyi hud nga'i rigs kyi sgron ma /
T08D4144:183b-36: kyi hud nga'i snying du sdug pa /
T08D4144:183b-37: kyi hud nga'i snying thams cad pa /
T08D4144:183b-38: kyi hud nga'i gces pa rnams bsdus pa /
T08D4144:183b-39: kyi hud nga'i mig gi bdud rtsi /
T08D4144:183b-40: kyi hud nga'i sdug pa'i 'ching ba /
T08D4144:183b-41: kyi hud nga'i rigs kyi thams cad pa /
T08D4144:183b-42: kyi hud ji ltar na ma brtags par mgon med

T08D4144:184a-1: dge ba bu yi mya ngan ni //

T08D4144:184a-4: grong khyer ba la gsol ba 'debs //
T08D4144:184a-5: ma dul pa'am gzugs ngan pa //
T08D4144:184a-6: bdag gi yid 'ong ma yin pa'i //
T08D4144:184a-7: bdag gi bu ni khyer gyur na //

T08D4144:184a-9: yon tan can gyi phyogs byed pa //
T08D4144:184a-10: gal te brtse ba yod ce na //

T08D4144:184a-12: de ltar grong khyer pa rnams mdzod //
T08D4144:184a-13: deng bdag gis ni tsan dan sogs //
T08D4144:184a-14: byug pa rnams kyis ma byugs shing //

T08D4144:184a-22: 'di yis phyag kyang ma byas na //
T08D4144:184a-23: tsham tshom med par 'di lta bur //
T08D4144:184a-24: nga yi bu ni khyer bar byed //
T08D4144:184a-25: deng bdag phyogs kun stong pa ste //
T08D4144:184a-27: snying yang sreg par 'gyur ba dang //

T08D4144:184a-34: rtsva bzhin snying ni sreg gyur pa //
T08D4144:184a-35: bdag gis sdig pa mi bzad pa //
T08D4144:184a-36: skye ba gzhan du byas par nges //

T08D4144:184a-38: sdig can dgra la'ang ma bskyed pa'i /
T08D4144:184a-39: bden pa des ni bdag gi bu //
T08D4144:184a-40: phangs pa 'di las thar par shog / ces smras so //
T08D4144:184a-41: ded dpon nyi ma yang rgya mtsho chen po las

T08D4144:184a-50: 'di lta bu'i ltas ngan pa kun du mthong ba

T08D4144:184b-4: ji ltar bdag mig 'gul pa dang //
T08D4144:184b-5: ji ltar bya rnams sgra sgrogs nas //
T08D4144:184b-6: da ni nges par bu dang deng //
T08D4144:184b-7: bral bar nye bar gnas pa yin//
T08D4144:184b-8: ji ltar yan lag rdul ba dang //
T08D4144:184b-9: nga yi snying ni 'dar ba las //
T08D4144:184b-10: nges par bu dang bral ba ste //
T08D4144:184b-11: mi bzad pa ni nyes bar gnas //
T08D4144:184b-12: de 'di ltar sdug bsngal brgya stong sems shing lus
T08D4144:184b-13: dang yan lag rdul la 'dar bas gom pa 'dor
T08D4144:184b-14: mi nus bzhin du nyam thag pas rgyal po'i khab

T08D4144:184b-17: de smre sngags kyi sgra de'i rjes su 'brangs nas lam po cher zhugs pa dang /
T08D4144:184b-18: ji srid cig na skye po'i tshogs mang po'i srin

T08D4144:184b-24: ded dpon nyi ma zhes bya ba'i bu gzhon nu

T08D4144:184b-26: tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig yod

T08D4144:184b-34: de thos pa dang ded dpon nyi ma bu dang

T08D4144:184b-37: de nas chu gtor bas slar dbugs phyung ba dang /
T08D4144:184b-38: mchi ma'i chu rlabs kyis gdong gi padma khebs bzhin
T08D4144:184b-39: du kun du 'khor la da lta bzhin du kyi
T08D4144:184b-40: hud lam gang nas gzhon nu gser mdog khyer bar
T08D4144:184b-41: gyur ces zer zhing lam po che'i dbus su rings
T08D4144:184b-42: pa rings par song ba dang /
T08D4144:184b-43: ji srid cig na chung ma skra grol ba //
T08D4144:184b-44: lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdung ba //
T08D4144:185a-2: de dang de'i smre sngags 'don pa dang /
T08D4144:185a-3: bu dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa /
T08D4144:185a-6: yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong
T08D4144:185a-7: bar mthong nas de yang drag cing nyam thag pas
T08D4144:185a-8: skad mdzer zhing brnangs bzhin du mchi mas mig khengs
T08D4144:185a-9: pa dang / de'i gan du song ngo //
T08D4144:185a-10: chung mas de mthong ba dang nyis 'gyur bas lhag pa'i sdug bsngal gyi zug rngus gzir te /
T08D4144:185a-11: mchi ma'i chu rlabs kyis bzhin gyi padma khebs shing rtabs bag tu rings pa rings par langs te /
T08D4144:185a-12: de'i mdun du bdag nyid 'gyel bar gyur to //
T08D4144:185a-13: de nas ded dpon nyi mas nyam thag pa'i skad
T08D4144:185a-14: kyi nga ros smra zhing 'khyud nas bslang ba dang
T08D4144:185a-15: / de de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
T08D4144:185a-16: ded dpon skyabs mdzod cig skyabs mdzod cig / nga la bu'i slong stsol cig / yang smras pa /
T08D4144:185a-17: skal ba ngan cing dga' bral ba //
T08D4144:185a-18: da ltar dbugs ni dbyung du gsol //
T08D4144:185a-19: bu dang bral bar gyur ba yi //
T08D4144:185a-20: sdug bsngal drag pos rnam par du //
T08D4144:185a-21: gang zhig skyes tshe bdag po khyed //
T08D4144:185a-22: mchog tu dgyes par gyur pa yi //
T08D4144:185a-23: yid du 'ong ba'i bu de nyid //
T08D4144:185a-24: ded ni gsod phyir khyer bar gyur //

T08D4144:185a-26: bstan bcos kun la mkhas gyur cing //

T08D4144:185a-28: mkhas par gyur ba'i bu khyer ro //
T08D4144:185a-29: khyed kyi rigs rgyud chad gyur cing //
T08D4144:185a-30: rigs kyi mtshams sbyor 'dzin pa dang //
T08D4144:185a-31: dpal ldan rigs ni gsal byed pa'i //
T08D4144:185a-32: khyed kyi sgron ma med par gyur //
T08D4144:185a-33: 'di ni snying gi thams cad de //
T08D4144:185a-35: mi rnams mig gi bdud rtsi 'di //
T08D4144:185a-36: gshed ma rnams kyis khyer bar gyur //

T08D4144:185a-42: 'bad pa de ni myur du mdzod //
T08D4144:185a-43: nor ni thams cad byin nas su //

T08D4144:185a-45: khyod kyis legs rtogs 'byor pa dang //
T08D4144:185a-46: khyed yid bsam pa 'grub nas ni //
T08D4144:185b-0: khyed kyi bu ni @185b blta bar bgyi //

T08D4144:185b-2: sdug bsngal gyis yid gdungs par gyur kyang brtan pas

T08D4144:185b-4: te grong khyer pa rnams la smras pa /
T08D4144:185b-5: kye kye grong khyer ba rnams nyon cig / ci
T08D4144:185b-6: ltar na nga la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal nye
T08D4144:185b-7: bar gnas pa la khyed rnams btang snyoms su byed
T08D4144:185b-8: pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /

T08D4144:185b-10: dbus su ma brtags par khyed rnams kyis mthong bzhin
T08D4144:185b-11: du nga'i gzhon nu yon tan gsal bar ston pa
T08D4144:185b-12: lta bu gsod pa'i phyir khyer na /
T08D4144:185b-13: ci'i phyir sems las chung bas gnas //
T08D4144:185b-14: ci'i phyir nye bar dpyad pa'i thabs mi sems /
T08D4144:185b-15: ci'i phyir gzhon nu thar pa'i don du brtson par mi byed /
T08D4144:185b-17: ded dpon 'di lta bu'i gzhon nu yon tan dang
T08D4144:185b-18: ldan pa 'di ni khyed gcig pu la 'di ltar
T08D4144:185b-19: sdug bsngal bar ma zad kyi /
T08D4144:185b-20: gzhan du na bdag cag thams cad kyang sdug bsngal mod kyi /
T08D4144:185b-21: 'on kyang gzhon nu 'di thar bar bya ba'i thabs ma mthong nas /
T08D4144:185b-22: gang 'di lta bu'i yi mug pas gnas pa yin no //
T08D4144:185b-23: ded dpon nyi mas smras pa /
T08D4144:185b-24: shes ldan dag khyed rnams kyis yongs su shes pa nyid de /
T08D4144:185b-25: gzhon nu 'di ji lta bu shin tu snying rje ba dang ldan pa /
T08D4144:185b-28: sems can thams cad la mnyen gshin pa yin te /
T08D4144:185b-29: 'dis 'di lta bu bya ba ma yin pa la 'jug pa sems kyis kyang mi nus na /
T08D4144:185b-30: kun du spyod par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T08D4144:185b-31: de bas na gzhon nu de slar dpyad pa'i don
T08D4144:185b-32: la 'bad pas rtsom par gyis shig / gal te
T08D4144:185b-33: gzhon nu legs par dpyad na nges par sdug bsngal
T08D4144:185b-35: khyed rnams kyang dam pa skye bo thams cad la
T08D4144:185b-36: thun mong du gyur pa yin pas khyed rnams kyis
T08D4144:185b-37: de gsol ba la nyes par ni gang yang ma

T08D4144:185b-40: de bas na gang snying rje'i sems nye bar 'jog
T08D4144:185b-41: pas song la rgyal po'am blon po la zhus shig

T08D4144:185b-43: rigs pa dang ldan pa khyed rnams kyi tshig kyang
T08D4144:186a-1: bdag kyang bu dang bral bas shin tu gdungs kyis bdag gi nor 'di thams cad kyang phul la //
T08D4144:186a-2: ji ltar gzhon nu legs par dpyad pa de ltar
T08D4144:186a-3: mdzod cig / ded dpon de ni kun gyis shes
T08D4144:186a-4: pa dang / mdza' bor byas pa yod pa de rnams kyis de'i tshig dang /
T08D4144:186a-5: gzhon nu yon tan la dga' bas khas blangs so //

T08D4144:186a-7: la shin tu byang ba'i grong khyer ba zhig rgyal
T08D4144:186a-8: po'i pho brang du btang ste bsgo ba /
T08D4144:186a-9: gal te deng gzhon nu shin tu legs par dpyad
T08D4144:186a-10: pa mdzad na bdag cag rnams kyis kyang rgyal po

T08D4144:189a-48: khyed kyi dge slong tshogs rnams stong //
T08D4144:189a-49: mkhas pa rnams ni mthong na snying //
T08D4144:189a-50: ci yi phyir na gas ma gyur //
T08D4144:189a-51: lha rnams dad pas yan lag gi / mchog btud nas ni spyi bo la //
T08D4144:189a-52: zhabs kyi rdul gyi mchog gyur pa //
T08D4144:189b-0: @189b sems can kun la mnyam mnyes pas //
T08D4144:189b-1: rtag tu gnod pa byed pa dag / gang yin pa la da rung khyod //
T08D4144:189b-2: phyogs ltung mdzad pas ma mthong ngo //
T08D4144:189b-3: yan lag brgyad ldan sman gyis ni //
T08D4144:189b-4: nyon mongs nad gso mdzad pa po //
T08D4144:189b-5: ston pa thugs rje cher ldan pa //
T08D4144:189b-6: sman pa'i rgyal po med par gyur //
T08D4144:189b-7: kyi hud brtse med 'jig rten mgon //
T08D4144:189b-8: mya ngan 'das pa ha cang sngas //
T08D4144:189b-9: 'jig rten long bar gyur pa la //
T08D4144:189b-10: bla med mig ni stsol ba yin //
T08D4144:189b-11: khyod kyi mya ngan 'das kyang deng //
T08D4144:189b-12: sdig pa med pa'i nor chen bu //
T08D4144:189b-13: gsod pa'i don du 'dis spangs na //
T08D4144:189b-14: su zhig 'phral du thar bar bgyid //
T08D4144:189b-15: mgon med rnams kyi skyob pa khyod //
T08D4144:189b-16: bgrod pa mchog tu gshegs gyur pa //
T08D4144:189b-17: kyi hud gu ni 'tsho ba yi //
T08D4144:189b-18: re ba da ni ma mchis so //
T08D4144:189b-19: bdag nyid chen po khyod kyis gang //
T08D4144:189b-20: sdug pa kun dang bral 'gyur zhes //
T08D4144:189b-21: gsung gi dam pa bka' stsal te //
T08D4144:189b-22: legs gsung yin par deng 'tshal to //
T08D4144:189b-23: de de ltar rnam pa mang por smre sngags 'don cing dge bsnyen de la smras pa /
T08D4144:189b-24: kye bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos chen po 'ga' zhig lus pa yod dam /
T08D4144:189b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan ba su la rjes su gtad nas mya ngan las 'das par mdzad /
T08D4144:189b-26: de nas dge bsnyen des smras pa //
T08D4144:189b-27: ded dpon bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'ong srungs
T08D4144:189b-28: chen po la yongs su gtad nas mya ngan las
T08D4144:189b-29: 'das so // gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos kyang
T08D4144:189b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nyid kyis gnas brtan kun
T08D4144:189b-31: dga' bo la bstan pa rjes su gtad nas mya
T08D4144:189b-32: ngan las 'das so zhes thos te /
T08D4144:189b-33: da ltar ni gnas brtan kun dga' bo bdag nyid che ba /
T08D4144:189b-34: bstan pa gces par 'dzin pa yin te /
T08D4144:189b-35: de da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du snying rjes grong dang grong khyer dang /
T08D4144:189b-37: tshong 'dus la sogs pa de dang der song nas
T08D4144:189b-38: sdug pa'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin par byed
T08D4144:189b-39: do // de bzhin du sems can dge ba'i rtsa
T08D4144:189b-40: ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
T08D4144:189b-42: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyun yang dag par bsags pa rnams ni yongs su smin par byed do //
T08D4144:190a-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud yongs su smin pa rnams ni rnam par grol @190a * //
T08D4144:190a-2: de bzhin du sman pa bzang po bzhin du nyon
T08D4144:190a-3: mongs ba'i nad kyis zi na pa'i sems can rnams
T08D4144:190a-4: ni chos ston pa'i sman gyi sbyin pas gso bar
T08D4144:190a-5: byed do // nyi ma bzhin nyon mongs pa'i mun
T08D4144:190a-6: par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la ni dam pa'i
T08D4144:190a-7: chos ston pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis nyon mongs
T08D4144:190a-8: pa'i mun pa sel bar byed do //
T08D4144:190a-9: zla ba bzhin du tshig gi 'od zer gyi tshogs
T08D4144:190a-10: kyis gdul bya'i ku mu ta'i tshal gyi kha dbye
T08D4144:190a-11: bar byed do // 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po
T08D4144:190a-12: bzhin du gdul bya khams kyi rgyal po stong phrag
T08D4144:190a-13: dam pa'i chos ston pas 'dul bar byed do //
T08D4144:190a-14: seng ge ltar rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pa'i
T08D4144:190a-15: sgras mu stegs ngan pa'i ri dags kyi tshogs dag
T08D4144:190a-17: lam stor ba dag yang dag par ston pas gdul bya'i tshong pa rnams sgrol bar byed do //
T08D4144:190a-18: ded dpon ltar dam pa'i chos kyi zong la 'jug par byed do //
T08D4144:190a-19: sprin chen po ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon skyed par byed do //
T08D4144:190a-20: pha dang ma ltar phan pa dang gnod pa nye
T08D4144:190a-21: bar ston par byed cing ma dul ba'i sems can
T08D4144:190a-23: ma grol ba rnams ni grol bar byed do //
T08D4144:190a-24: dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs 'byin par byed do //
T08D4144:190a-25: yongs su mya ngan las ma das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do //
T08D4144:190a-26: de bzhin du nyam thag pa chen pos nyen pa'i
T08D4144:190a-27: sems can rnams ni 'jig pa chen po las thar
T08D4144:190a-28: bar byed do // mdor na bdag nyid che na
T08D4144:190a-29: po des ni sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed do
T08D4144:190a-30: bar byed do // // de nyid rjes su sbron cig dang /
T08D4144:190a-31: des ni khyed kyi bu nyam nga ba 'di las thar bar byed par nus so //
T08D4144:190a-32: de thos pa dang ded dpon nyi ma srog stor
T08D4144:190a-33: ba las slar rnyed pa bzhin du shin tu dga'
T08D4144:190a-34: ste rtabs bag gis dris pa /
T08D4144:190a-35: 'phags pa kun dga' bo ded lta gang na bzhugs /
T08D4144:190a-37: ded dpon gnas brtan kun dga' bo ni da ltar
T08D4144:190a-38: yangs pa can gyi aa mra skyong ba'i nags na
T08D4144:190a-40: de nas ded dpon nyi ma de ma thag langs
T08D4144:190a-41: te pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs nas
T08D4144:190a-42: yangs pa can gang na pa der btud nas bu
T08D4144:190a-43: dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen cing mchi ma'i
T08D4144:190b-0: chu rlabs kyis gdong @190b gi padmo khebs bzhin du
T08D4144:190b-1: mchi mas kun du khyab pa dang ldan zhing bsam
T08D4144:190b-2: pa drag pos gnas brtan kun dga' bo la gsol
T08D4144:190b-3: ba 'debs pa la zhugs par gyur to //

T08D4144:190b-5: bsam dang bag la nyal mkhyen to //
T08D4144:190b-6: gsol ba 'debs pa 'di gson cig / sangs rgyas bcom ldan slob ma ni //
T08D4144:190b-8: de yi bstan pa 'phel byed pa'i //
T08D4144:190b-9: khyed gcig pu ni lus par gyur //
T08D4144:190b-10: khyod ni 'gro ba'i dpung gnyen dang //
T08D4144:190b-11: khyod ni dbugs phyin gyur pa yin //
T08D4144:190b-12: rtag tu sems can don mdzad pa //
T08D4144:190b-13: da ltar dgongs pa gzir bar mdzod //
T08D4144:190b-14: mgon khyod ma lus bsrung ba ni //
T08D4144:190b-16: smre sa med par bdag gi bu //
T08D4144:190b-17: ci phyir 'di ltar gsod par byed //
T08D4144:190b-18: gal te 'gro don mi mnga' na //
T08D4144:190b-20: 'gro ba dang ldan gsod bzhin du //
T08D4144:190b-21: 'di la ji ltar btang snyoms mdzad //
T08D4144:190b-22: 'gro ba'i don du sku lus ni //
T08D4144:190b-23: brtul zhugs bzang po 'dzin mdzad pa'i //
T08D4144:190b-24: thugs rje de mngon mdzad nas ni //
T08D4144:190b-25: bdag gi bu la dgongs su gsol //
T08D4144:190b-26: las kyi sgo kun bcom gyur cing //
T08D4144:190b-27: skyabs med dpung gnyen med par ni //
T08D4144:190b-28: mya ngan 'dam la nub pa bdag / chung mar bcas pa gdon du gsol //
T08D4144:190b-29: sh'akya'i seng ges khyed nyid ni //
T08D4144:190b-30: da ltar gtso bor bstan mdzad na //
T08D4144:190b-31: 'gro la phan pa gzhan gang la //
T08D4144:190b-32: gzhan gang la ni gsol ba btab //
T08D4144:190b-33: gtso bo khyod ni ma gtogs pa //
T08D4144:190b-34: bu yi skyabs gzhan ma mchis pas //
T08D4144:190b-35: de bas rings par byon nas ni //
T08D4144:190b-36: bdag gi bu ni bskyab tu gsol //
T08D4144:190b-37: bu yi mya ngan bzod dka' la //
T08D4144:190b-38: rang bzhin ngan pa'i sgras zin pa'i //
T08D4144:190b-39: chung mar bcas pa dga' bral ba //
T08D4144:190b-40: kun dga' deng ni dga' skyed gsol //
T08D4144:190b-41: de nas bar skabs der gnas brtan kun dga' bo
T08D4144:190b-42: snying rjes gdungs bzhin du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
T08D4144:190b-43: gsum du nyan thos kyi mig gis 'jig rten la
T08D4144:190b-47: su ni nyam nga bar gyur /
T08D4144:190b-48: su ni sdug bsngal bar gyur //
T08D4144:191a-2: su ni ngan song la bab /
T08D4144:191a-3: su ni ngan song lam las blan te mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhag par bya /
T08D4144:191a-4: su ni 'dod ba'i 'dam du bying ba lag nas drang bar bya /
T08D4144:191a-5: su ni 'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba la 'phags
T08D4144:191a-6: pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug gi bdag po la rab
T08D4144:191a-7: tu gzhag par bya zhes gnas brtan kun dga' bos
T08D4144:191a-8: gnas brta na sh'a ri'i bu dang mnyam pa'i mig
T08D4144:191a-9: gis bltas na / gzhon nu gser mdog dge ba'i
T08D4144:191a-10: rtsa ba'i tshogs nye bar bsags pa nyam thag pa
T08D4144:191a-11: chen pos nyen par gyur par mthong ngo //
T08D4144:191a-12: mthong nas kyang yang de nyid nas gnas gzhan du
T08D4144:191a-13: rdzu 'phrul gyis glang po che'i sna lta bu'i lag
T08D4144:191a-14: pa brkyang nas de'i mod kho na las rgyal po
T08D4144:191a-15: ma skyes dgra khang bzangs kyi steng gi gzhi na
T08D4144:191a-16: shin tu bag med par gnas pa na /
T08D4144:191a-17: se gol gi sgras go bar byas nas sgra gsal bar smras pa /
T08D4144:191a-18: rgyal po chen po gang gzhon nu gser mdog rang
T08D4144:191a-19: nyid kyis rnam par ma dpyad pa ni legs par
T08D4144:191a-21: de yang da lta gnod pa med cing nyes pa
T08D4144:191a-22: ma byas bzhin du rgyal po'i khab nas phyung ste
T08D4144:191a-23: dur khrod chen por khyer nas gsod kyis de las
T08D4144:191a-24: zlog shig / de nas gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i
T08D4144:191a-26: rgyal po rtabs bag tu rings par gnas brtan kun
T08D4144:191a-27: dga' bo khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pa la
T08D4144:191a-28: phyag byas te langs nas sgra chen por phyogs pa
T08D4144:191a-29: zhir bos pa / kye nyon cig gang dur khrod chen por rings pa rings par song nas //
T08D4144:191a-30: gzhon nu gser mdog gsod par byed pa la pa'i
T08D4144:191a-31: tshig gis thar par byed pa de langs gser gyi
T08D4144:191a-33: yul gyi mchog lnga sbyin no //
T08D4144:191a-34: rgyal po'i tshig de thos pa dang /
T08D4144:191a-35: gzhon nu de ni skye bo mang po'i yid du
T08D4144:191a-36: 'ong ba yin pas srog chags brgya stong du mas
T08D4144:191a-37: rings par brgyugs par gyur to //
T08D4144:191a-38: de nas bar skabs der gshed ma pa rnams rgyal
T08D4144:191a-39: po'i skyes bu de rnams kyis bsrungs nas gzhon nu
T08D4144:191a-40: gser mdog khyer te dur khrod chen por phyin to
T08D4144:191a-41: // bu mo ka shi mdzes dga' mo yang rang gi nye du rnams kyis gos sngon po dang /
T08D4144:191b-0: dkar pos brgyan pa byas pa'i khyogs @191b la bteg
T08D4144:191b-1: ste dur khrod chen por khyer nas de'i gnyen rnams
T08D4144:191b-2: kyis de phyogs gcig tu bzhag ste /
T08D4144:191b-3: shing bsdus nas ro bsregs pa'i shing brtsig pa la zhugs te /
T08D4144:191b-4: gshed ma pa de rnams kyis smras pa /
T08D4144:191b-5: khyed rnams kyis re zhig 'di'i ro bsreg pa'i shing
T08D4144:191b-6: ma brtsig par ci tsam na khyed kyis nged kyi
T08D4144:191b-7: gzhon nu gser mdog gsal shing la skyon te /
T08D4144:191b-8: bsad kyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T08D4144:191b-9: gzhon nu gser mdog de dang bu mo ka shi
T08D4144:191b-10: mdzes dga' mo ro bsreg shing gcig la bzhag ste
T08D4144:191b-11: bsreg par bya'o zhes smras nas /
T08D4144:191b-12: gsal shing la btsugs par gyur to //
T08D4144:191b-13: gzhon nu gser mdog gsal shing sa la btsugs pa bltas nas ma rjes su dran te /
T08D4144:191b-14: sdug bsngal drag pos rgyud zhu bar byas pas mchi ma glog pa la zhugs par gyur te /
T08D4144:191b-15: de ltar ma nga dang bral bar thos pa dang gnas skabs cir gyur zhig gu /
T08D4144:191b-16: gang gi tshe thun dang po'i mtshan phyed la ma
T08D4144:191b-17: mthong na yang shin tu gnod pa drag po myong
T08D4144:191b-18: na des deng bu gcig pa dang bral na srog
T08D4144:191b-20: kyi hud nga ni 'di lta bu'i skal ba ngan pa ste /
T08D4144:191b-21: nga skyes pas ma nga dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur to //
T08D4144:191b-22: de nas gshed ma pa rnams kyis gsal shing de
T08D4144:191b-23: sa la btsugs te phan tshun smra bar rtsom pa
T08D4144:191b-24: / bdag cag las su zhig gis gzhon nu 'di gsal shing la bskyon par bya /
T08D4144:191b-25: der yang re re nas sgyu byed pa la zhugs te /
T08D4144:191b-26: khyed rnams kyis skyon cig / nga ni deng mgo bo'i nad kyis shin tu gzir to //
T08D4144:191b-27: de bzhin dung ni rgyab nas gzer ro //
T08D4144:191b-28: nga ni mchan khung nas gzer ro zhes zer zhing
T08D4144:191b-29: de rnams gang yang bya ba ma yin pa de
T08D4144:191b-30: byed par spro bar ma gyur to //
T08D4144:191b-31: de nas gzhon nu gser mdog gis de rnams phan
T08D4144:191b-32: tshun smra ba thos nas gsal shing sa la btsugs
T08D4144:191b-34: kyi hud da ni nges par nga med par 'gyur
T08D4144:191b-35: ro zhes 'khor ba'i nyes pa la skyo zhing thar
T08D4144:191b-36: pa'i lam mngon par 'dod pas bdag nyid dga' ba
T08D4144:191b-37: dang bral bar shes nas mchog tu 'jigs pa'i mya
T08D4144:191b-38: ngan gyis g-yo ba'i mig gis lta zhing cho nges
T08D4144:192a-1: rnyed par dka' ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi dga' ston
T08D4144:192a-2: rnyed nas don gyi bya ba ma byas pa nyid
T08D4144:192a-4: kyi hud yang 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
T08D4144:192a-5: slar 'khor ba'i btson ra chen por gnas par 'gyur ro //
T08D4144:192a-6: yang 'khor ba'i 'brog stong par yongs su 'khyams par 'gyur ro //
T08D4144:192a-7: yang 'khor ba'i tshang tshing chen por zhugs par 'gyur ro //
T08D4144:192a-8: yang 'khor ba'i g-yang sa chen po rab tu ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T08D4144:192a-9: yang 'khor ba'i 'dam rdzab kyi nang du gnas par 'gyur ro //
T08D4144:192a-10: yang bdag ni yang sos dang /
T08D4144:192a-17: mnar med pa la sogs pa'i dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T08D4144:192a-18: slar yang bdag glang po che dang /
T08D4144:192a-24: byi la ste sna tshogs pa'i skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T08D4144:192a-25: slar yang rtag tu bkres pa dang /
T08D4144:192a-26: skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal chen po dang /
T08D4144:192a-28: yid mi bde bas nyen pa rnams dang /
T08D4144:192a-30: btung ba'i sgra rnams yang mi thos shing bshang ba dang /
T08D4144:192a-33: ngar snabs la sogs pa za zhing yi dags lkog ma'i lba ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T08D4144:192a-34: dper na au dum b'a ra'i me tog ni brgya
T08D4144:192a-35: lam na lan 'ga' 'byung ba ltar de bzhin gshegs
T08D4144:192a-36: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T08D4144:192a-37: rgyas ni 'jig rten du brgya lam na lan 'ga'
T08D4144:192a-39: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'jig
T08D4144:192a-40: rten du ston par mdzad pa yang 'byung bar dka'
T08D4144:192a-41: bar shes so // dal 'byor ni rnyed par dka'o //
T08D4144:192a-42: mir skyes ba ni rnyed par dka'o //
T08D4144:192a-43: 'phags pa'i yul du skyes pa dang /
T08D4144:192a-45: glen pa ma yin pa dang /
T08D4144:192a-47: lkugs pa ma yin pa dang /
T08D4144:192a-48: lag brdas mi smra ba dang /
T08D4144:192b-0: nyes par bshad pa'i chos rnams kyi don bshad pa rnyed par dka'o zhes @192b thos la /
T08D4144:192b-1: bdag kyang skyabs dang bral bas deng ni med par 'gyur te /
T08D4144:192b-2: mi khom pa brgyad las thar pa'i mir skyes ba
T08D4144:192b-3: nyid kyang da ni 'bras bu med par 'gyur na
T08D4144:192b-4: de la da ci zhig bya /
T08D4144:192b-5: ci bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan
T08D4144:192b-6: pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa ni gang zhig rjes su
T08D4144:192b-7: dran pas nga gnas skabs 'di lta bu mgon med
T08D4144:192b-12: shin tu nyam thag pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen par
T08D4144:192b-13: gyur pa la thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis byon
T08D4144:192b-14: nas yongs su skyob par mdzad par gyur pa zhig
T08D4144:192b-15: na / bcom ldan 'das de yang nga'i ska la
T08D4144:192b-16: ba ngan pa'i nyes pas myur ba myur bar yongs
T08D4144:192b-17: su mya ngan las 'das pas de la da su
T08D4144:192b-18: zhig gnas skabs 'dir rjes su dran par bya /
T08D4144:192b-19: su zhig nga la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du
T08D4144:192b-20: thugs rje chen pos byon nas yongs su skyob par
T08D4144:192b-21: byed par 'gyur zhes re thag chad de dpyod 'dar
T08D4144:192b-23: de la yang blo skyes pa /
T08D4144:192b-24: gnas brtan kun dga' bo zhes bya ba bdag nyid
T08D4144:192b-25: chen po bzhugs kyis de rjes su dran par bya
T08D4144:192b-26: ste / bdag nyid chen po de la sems can
T08D4144:192b-27: thams cad la phan par sems pa la rtse gcig
T08D4144:192b-28: pa'i rgyud chen po dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das
T08D4144:192b-29: de dang gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos bstan pa
T08D4144:192b-30: ma lus par rjes su gtad pa yin te /
T08D4144:192b-31: des da ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa mdzad pa /
T08D4144:192b-33: mthu che ba yin par thos te /
T08D4144:192b-34: gnas brtan kun dga' bos ni phongs pa 'di las
T08D4144:192b-35: bdag yongs su skyob par spyod cig / de nyid
T08D4144:192b-36: rjes su dran par bya'o snyam du bsams nas mchi

T08D4144:197a-22: snying ni phyung bar gyur par nges //

T08D4144:197a-28: mdung gis snying gar rab bsnun zhing //

T08D4144:197b-8: bdag nyid kyis ni byas pa'i las //

T08D4144:197b-21: bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs byed pa la zhugs te /
T08D4144:197b-22: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bu mo

T08D4144:197b-29: bden pa'i tshig 'dis 'di'i lus la dug rnam par 'jig par gyur cig ces smras so //

T08D4144:197b-38: ae ma'o gzhon nu bsam pa rnam par dag go //

T08D4144:200a-0: // @200a * // 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob

T08D4144:200a-11: rmad du byung ba'i tshe 'phrul de yang mthong nas

T08D4144:200a-19: bdag nyid chen po ston mdzad pa //

T08D4144:200a-21: khyod kyis 'gro ba'i skyabs mdzad do //

T08D4144:200b-14: kun dga' zhes bya'i mtshan btags 'di //
T08D4144:200b-15: ae ma'o don dang bcas par 'gyur //

T08D4144:200b-29: khyed gdod gnas brtan kun dga' bo //
T08D4144:200b-30: byon nas slar yang blta ba yin //

T08D4144:201a-0: sngon gyi skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par bltas par brtsams pa @201a * //

T08D4144:201a-9: de ni de ltar yang sems can rnams bsod nams
T08D4144:201a-10: la gus pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams
T08D4144:201a-11: kyi bdag nyid che ba bstan par bya'o snyam mo
T08D4144:201a-12: // de nas gos de rang gi lus las phud pa dang /

T08D4144:201b-0: sgras rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'gengs @201b shing /

T08D4144:206b-0: de @206b nas rgyal pos gnas brtan kun dga' bo la zhus pa /

T08D4144:209a-48: dang / mod kho na la sna khung gnyis bkag
T08D4144:209a-49: nas shing dang rdo ba dang gyo mo la sogs
T08D4144:209a-50: pas brdegs te 'di nas myur du song shig ces
T08D4144:209a-51: grong khyer gyi mi gtsang pa 'dam rdzab 'gro shes
T08D4144:209a-52: pa lta bur lta zhing skrod par byed do /
T08D4144:209b-0: @209b gang dang gang du song ba de dang der
T08D4144:209b-1: shing dang rdo dang gyo mo la sogs pa rnams
T08D4144:209b-2: kyis brdegs nas skrod par byed do //
T08D4144:209b-3: des slong mo gcig kyang rnyed par ma gyur cing
T08D4144:209b-4: shing dang rdo dang gyo mo la sogs pa rnams
T08D4144:209b-5: kyis brdegs pas slong phor yang chag par gyur nas
T08D4144:209b-6: / smre sngags 'don bzhin du ma'i drung du phyin te /
T08D4144:209b-7: shin tu yang zhum par gyur pas cho nges 'debs pa la zhugs so //
T08D4144:209b-8: de nas de mthong pa dang brang brdungs te /
T08D4144:209b-10: kyi hud bu khyod sdug bsngal te //
T08D4144:209b-11: su la'ang gnod pa ma byas par //
T08D4144:209b-12: snying rje spangs pa gang zhig gis //
T08D4144:209b-13: 'di ltar brdegs pas khyod sdug bsngal //
T08D4144:209b-14: de nas gzhon nu mi sdug pas sgra dang bcas par rab tu dus te smras pa /
T08D4144:209b-15: gang dang gang gi khyim sgor ni //
T08D4144:209b-16: slong mo spyad phyir bdag 'gro ba //
T08D4144:209b-17: de dang der ni gyo mo rdo //
T08D4144:209b-18: shing la sogs pa bdag la rdeg / de thos
T08D4144:209b-19: pa dang ded dpon gyi chung mas gzhon nu mi
T08D4144:209b-21: sgra dang bcas pas dus te smras pa /
T08D4144:209b-22: nyes pa med kyang shin tu ni //
T08D4144:209b-23: gang dag gzhan gyis brdegs gyur pas //
T08D4144:209b-24: skye ba gzhan du bu khyod kyis //
T08D4144:209b-25: sdig pa mi bzang byas par nges //
T08D4144:209b-26: kyi hud khyod ni sdug bsngal lo //
T08D4144:209b-27: bde ba kun dang rnam bral ba //
T08D4144:209b-28: shin tu mi sdug gyur pa 'di //
T08D4144:209b-29: dman pa ci tsam mthong na go / sems ldan snying rje cis mi skye //
T08D4144:209b-30: kyi hud bcom zhing nyams pa bdag / bu khyod kyi ni slong mo snod //
T08D4144:209b-31: bcom pas lus kyang bcom yin te //
T08D4144:209b-32: slong mo tsam gyis 'tsho ba yin //
T08D4144:209b-33: pha dang ma dang bral ba dang //
T08D4144:209b-34: khyim gyi rten ni med gyur la //
T08D4144:209b-35: gang gis snying rje spangs nas ni //
T08D4144:209b-36: khyod kyi slong snod de bcag gyur //
T08D4144:209b-37: rigs rgyud thams cad nyams gyur cing //
T08D4144:209b-38: bshes dang gnyen gyis rnam spangs pas //
T08D4144:209b-39: bla ma mdza' bo mgon gyur nyid //
T08D4144:209b-40: slong snod su yis bcag par gyur //
T08D4144:209b-41: kyi hud bu sdug dman pa mthong nas ni //
T08D4144:209b-42: khyod la su yis dpal tshul bstan par gyur //
T08D4144:209b-43: kyi hud sngon gyi rang gi las kyis ni //
T08D4144:209b-44: bu sdug khyod ni gnod pas bcom par gyur //
T08D4144:209b-45: kyi hud dman pa'i bu la dpa' ba ni //
T08D4144:209b-46: gang gi snying la brtse ba mi sems pas //
T08D4144:209b-47: rdo dang so phag rtsub pa lta bu yi //
T08D4144:209b-48: sems can gang yin de ring khyod kyis smros //
T08D4144:209b-49: kyi hud sgo brgyas bcom pa yi //
T08D4144:209b-50: sdug bsngal gyis gdungs slong mo rgyu //
T08D4144:210a-2: 'jig rten yid ni spro bar gyur //
T08D4144:210a-3: bkres dang skom pas yongs dub cing //
T08D4144:210a-4: phun tshogs kun gyis rnam spangs pa //
T08D4144:210a-5: nad dang sdug bsngal rnams kyis gdungs //
T08D4144:210a-6: khyed la su zhig brdeg par brtson //
T08D4144:210a-7: nyam thag dman pa'i bzhin gyis ni //
T08D4144:210a-8: du zhing bkres pas rab gzir ba//
T08D4144:210a-9: lkog ma skam pa mthong na deng //
T08D4144:210a-10: khyod la su yis brtse ma byas //
T08D4144:210a-11: der ni nad kyis zil mnan cing //
T08D4144:210a-12: sdug bsngal ldan pa brtse spangs te //
T08D4144:210a-13: rigs snyems dregs pas dkrugs pa ni //
T08D4144:210a-14: gang gis bu khyod ji ltar rdegs //
T08D4144:210a-15: kyi hud gang gis khyed bkres gzir //
T08D4144:210a-16: slong mos nyes bsags gyur pa yis //
T08D4144:210a-17: bza' ba chung du de yang deng //
T08D4144:210a-18: khyi dang wa yang spyod par byed //
T08D4144:210a-19: kyi hud bu sdug bsngal ngan pa //
T08D4144:210a-20: dva go da ni ji ltar byed //
T08D4144:210a-21: sngon byas sdig pa byed pa po //
T08D4144:210a-22: mi sdug las kyis bcom par gyur //
T08D4144:210a-23: de ltar de rnam pa du mas mya ngan byed
T08D4144:210a-24: bzhin du 'chag cing grugs pa'i gnas kyi bum bu'i
T08D4144:210a-25: mdun du khrag gi rgyun gyis yan lag gos pa'i
T08D4144:210a-28: gyo mo mi gtsang ba dang /
T08D4144:210a-29: tsher ma la sogs pas khyab pa'i sar bsnyal te /
T08D4144:210a-30: dal bu dal bus lag pas mnye bar brtsams pa dang /
T08D4144:210a-31: ji tsam na srang bar de na tshong dpon gyi bu dang /
T08D4144:210a-33: gzhan yang mtho zhing mtho ba'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ka shi ka'i ras dang /
T08D4144:210a-37: ras phra zhing rin che ba sna tshogs gyon pa dang /
T08D4144:210a-43: se mo do sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /
T08D4144:210a-44: dri zhim pa'i me tog gi tshogs kha bye ba
T08D4144:210a-45: rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus la spud pa 'gro
T08D4144:210a-47: de bdag nyid shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i gnas skabs la bltas shing /
T08D4144:210a-48: bu mi sdug pa de yang de bzhin du bzhin
T08D4144:210a-49: dman pa la bltas nas dbugs tsha ba ring po
T08D4144:210a-50: phyung ste / mchi ma dang bdas pas shin tu dman pa'i tshig gsang mthong pos smras pa /
T08D4144:210a-51: phun tshogs du ma brgyas khyab pa //
T08D4144:210a-52: rin chen gyis ni rgya mtsho bzhin //
T08D4144:210a-53: rgyas pa'i ris su gyur nas kyang //
T08D4144:210a-54: bde ba'i mchog la rjes su spyad //
T08D4144:210a-55: rgud pa'i cha las byung bas na //
T08D4144:210b-0: phyag dar @210b khrod kyi seb gnas shing //
T08D4144:210b-1: zas ma rnyed pas bkres pa dang //
T08D4144:210b-2: shin tu nyam ngas 'tsho bar gyur //
T08D4144:210b-3: mya ngan rgya mtsho sdug bsngal chu rlabs 'jigs //
T08D4144:210b-4: gdung ba'i chu srin mi zad brgya yis khyab //
T08D4144:210b-5: dbul ba'i chu klung rgya mtshor zhugs gyur nas //
T08D4144:210b-6: kye hud bcom zhes sgra ni rnam par sgrogs //
T08D4144:210b-7: rgud pa'i chu srin brgya yis kun du dkrugs //
T08D4144:210b-8: phongs pa'i rba rlabs 'jigs pa rab tu g-yo //
T08D4144:210b-9: nad ces 'jigs pa mi bzad nub pa yis //
T08D4144:210b-10: dbu ba'i rang bzhin chu bor zhugs par gyur //
T08D4144:210b-11: sdug bsngal rdo khrod nad ni rtsub pas khyab //
T08D4144:210b-12: gdung ba'i seng ge'i sgra yis gang ba'i yul //
T08D4144:210b-13: mya ngan bya ni brgya phrag lhags gyur pa //
T08D4144:210b-14: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal gnas ni thob par gyur //
T08D4144:210b-15: bag med 'khrul pa dag gis bsams pas sngon //
T08D4144:210b-16: dam pa rnams la sbyin pa ma byin pas //
T08D4144:210b-17: da lta 'di nas skal ngan dman pa yis //
T08D4144:210b-18: dregs ldan gdong la rtag tu lta bar byed //
T08D4144:210b-19: dman dang skal pa dang bral rmongs dang ni //
T08D4144:210b-20: slong mo la spyod slong mo'ang mang du ma byin pas //
T08D4144:210b-21: gang des gnas khang tsam yang 'byor par ma gyur pa'i //
T08D4144:210b-22: dman zhing phongs pa'i mi bzad dag tu zhugs par gyur //
T08D4144:210b-23: nges par sa steng kun gyis bkur ba'i bla ma dang //
T08D4144:210b-24: yang dag phrad kyang brnyas shing bsnyen bkur ma byas pa //
T08D4144:210b-25: gang des de ltar yu bu brnyas par gyur pa dang //
T08D4144:210b-26: de ltar 'gro ba'i rmongs pa'i snod du gyur pa yin //
T08D4144:210b-27: gang gis rdo dang bong pa yis //
T08D4144:210b-29: sngon gyi skye bar legs bsdams pa //
T08D4144:210b-30: mang po nges par brdegs pa yin //
T08D4144:210b-31: gang gis 'jig rten pa rnams ni //
T08D4144:210b-32: kun nas yongs su snad gyur pa //
T08D4144:210b-33: sngon ni bla ma'i skye bo la //
T08D4144:210b-34: yongs su spyos par gyur par nges //
T08D4144:210b-35: gang 'dis brnyas pa'i sdug bsngal ni //
T08D4144:210b-36: shin tu mi bzad rjes thob pa //
T08D4144:210b-37: sngon chad bla ma'i skye bo la //
T08D4144:210b-38: yongs su brnyas par gyur par nges //
T08D4144:210b-39: yu bus sngon gyi skye bo la //
T08D4144:210b-40: blo bur lhags la gos dag ni //
T08D4144:210b-41: ma byin pa ni gang yin pas //
T08D4144:210b-42: da ltar yu bu gos med gyur //
T08D4144:210b-43: gang gis gnyen bshes dang bral te //
T08D4144:210b-44: yu bu sdug bsngal yun ring du /
T08D4144:210b-45: se po mang po du ba yi //
T08D4144:210b-46: nga ro 'don du bcug pa yin //
T08D4144:210b-47: gang gis gseg ma rdos khyab pa'i //
T08D4144:210b-48: sa gzhir yu bu nyal gyur pa //
T08D4144:211a-0: sna tshogs gos ni bkab pa @211a * //
T08D4144:211a-2: mal stan sngon ma byin pa yin //
T08D4144:211a-3: stan ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
T08D4144:211a-4: dam pa rnams ni ma byin pas //
T08D4144:211a-5: gang gi tsher ma mang po yis //
T08D4144:211a-6: khyab pa'i sa yi gzhi la gnas //
T08D4144:211a-7: gang gi tsher mas khyab pa yi //
T08D4144:211a-8: sa gzhir yu bu rnam rgyu ba //
T08D4144:211a-9: sngon chad lham dang bzhon pa ni //
T08D4144:211a-10: bde bskyed pa ma byin yin //
T08D4144:211a-11: nyi ma'i 'od tshogs rnams kyis dbus kyi cha snang byas //
T08D4144:211a-12: phyag dar phung po gang gis 'di ni yu bu gnas //
T08D4144:211a-13: slong ba'i 'gro la khang pa'i gnas tsam phal cher ni //
T08D4144:211a-14: gnas kyi ser snas nges par ma byin gyur pa yin //
T08D4144:211a-15: gang gis da ltar yu bu shin tu kha skams la //
T08D4144:211a-16: mgrin par skams shing kha dang 'gram pa yongs skams pa //
T08D4144:211a-17: yid la chu 'dod kun du bltas nas sngon chad ni //
T08D4144:211a-18: de la bsil gyur chu ni sbyin pa ma byin zhing //
T08D4144:211a-19: slong dang sdug phongs pa la zas ma byin pa dang //
T08D4144:211a-20: gnyen dang mdza' bshes la min rtsa lag tshogs la'ang min //
T08D4144:211a-21: legs par spyad nas thams cad las kyis longs spyod pa //
T08D4144:211a-22: des na 'dir ni zas bral yu bu yongs su 'khyams //
T08D4144:211a-23: srid pa gzhan du rnam pa mang por nges par ni //
T08D4144:211a-24: gzhan gyi don sgrub mkhas pa rnams la mtshang 'dru bas //
T08D4144:211a-25: gang gis 'di na da ltar 'jig rten dman pa'i yang //
T08D4144:211a-26: shin tu mtshang 'dru'i gnas su yu bu nye bar gyur //
T08D4144:211a-27: yu bus nyes pa rnam mang du //
T08D4144:211a-28: rigs kyis khengs shing dregs brten la //
T08D4144:211a-29: yon tan ldan pa'ang brdegs pas na //
T08D4144:211a-30: gang gis de ltar mi bzad skyed //
T08D4144:211a-32: nad rnams thams cad sel byed pa'i //
T08D4144:211a-33: sman ni sngon chad ma byin pas //
T08D4144:211a-34: gang gis nad kyis mngon gdungs yin //
T08D4144:211a-35: pha la khrus ma byas shing ma dang bshes la'ang min //
T08D4144:211a-36: bla ma tshim par ma byas 'jig rten mgon la'ang min //
T08D4144:211a-37: gang gis khrus dang gdung bral byas pas skyes gyur cing //
T08D4144:211a-38: 'di ni sdug bsngal brgya yis skal bcom mgon med gyur //
T08D4144:211a-39: bkres dang skom pas yongs dub cing //
T08D4144:211a-40: gza' dang bgo ba rnam bral ba //
T08D4144:211a-41: nad dang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa //
T08D4144:211a-42: yu bu su zhig skyong bar gyur //
T08D4144:211a-43: 'jig rten du ni rnyed dka' ba'i //
T08D4144:211a-44: gang gis de ni srog stor zhing //
T08D4144:211a-45: yu bus gang gi bran dang ni //
T08D4144:211a-46: de ring su yi las byed bya //
T08D4144:211a-47: kye ma'o dbul ba sdug bsngal te //
T08D4144:211b-0: @211b kye ma'o bsod nams ma byas nyid //
T08D4144:211b-1: 'di ltar rgyas pa'i grong khyer du'ang //
T08D4144:211b-2: mgon med yu bu ji bzhin no //
T08D4144:211b-3: 'di dang gzhan dag yang ded dpon gyi chung ma
T08D4144:211b-4: bkres pas yongs su gdungs pa'i yid dang bdag nyid
T08D4144:211b-6: ded dpon rna can yang rgya mtsho chen por gru zhig pa dang /
T08D4144:211b-7: stes dbang gis byis pa gcig dang lhan cig spang
T08D4144:211b-8: leb la 'jus te chu'i gnas nas rgal nas shin
T08D4144:211b-9: tu nyam thag pa chen pos slong mo rgyu zhing
T08D4144:211b-10: rgyal po'i pho brang mnyan ldan du phyin pa dang
T08D4144:211b-11: / de der phyi rol gyi zhing gcig tu mtshan mo gnas par gyur pa na /
T08D4144:211b-12: der yang zho shas 'tsho ba'i skyes bu gzhan zhig gnas pa des de shes pa dang /
T08D4144:211b-14: ded dpon 'di shin tu ring pa dang /
T08D4144:211b-15: bdog ba'i rdzas thams cad nyams pa dang /
T08D4144:211b-16: khye'u gcig dang lhan cig 'ongs na de la khyim gyi lo rgyus ji ltar brjod par bya /
T08D4144:211b-17: yang na rang nyid kyis shes par 'gyur gyi snyam
T08D4144:211b-18: nas des de la lag pa bkru ba'i chu byin
T08D4144:211b-19: te / ma sha'i snum khur gnyis byin no //
T08D4144:211b-20: de nas ded dpon rna can lag pa stong pas khyim du 'jug par mi bya'o snyam nas /
T08D4144:211b-21: ma sha'i snum khur gcig bzhag nas khye'u'i lag tu gtad cing /
T08D4144:211b-22: gcig phyed phyed du bgos te bza' ba'i don du khye'u de dang lhan cig zos so //
T08D4144:211b-23: de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la ma sha'i snum
T08D4144:211b-24: khur de thogs nas shin tu rtsub cing lus nyam
T08D4144:211b-25: chung ba dang / shin tu dri ma dang bcas
T08D4144:211b-26: pa'i ras gcig tsam zhig gyon nas rgyal po'i pho
T08D4144:211b-27: brang mnyan ldan du zhugs te /
T08D4144:211b-28: rang gi khyim du chas so //
T08D4144:211b-29: gzhon nu mi sdug pa'am nam langs pa'i dus nyid na bkres pa dang /
T08D4144:211b-30: skom pas yongs su nyam chung ba bzhin du dang /
T08D4144:211b-31: skal pa ngan pa bdag nyid 'di na gnas pas ci zhig bya /
T08D4144:211b-32: srog kyang dgos pa med kyis song la bdag nyid gsod par bya'o snyam nas /
T08D4144:211b-34: ma bdag ni pha'i skyed mos tshal du mchi zhes smras te /
T08D4144:211b-35: skyed mos tshal der chas so //
T08D4144:211b-36: ded dpon rna can yang rang gi khyim dang nye bar phyin pa dang /
T08D4144:211b-37: ci tsam zhig nas ring po ma lon par dur
T08D4144:211b-38: khror gyi mdog can gyi sa'i tshogs tsam lhag mar
T08D4144:211b-39: lus pa mthong nas bltas te /
T08D4144:211b-40: 'di ci zhig yin zhes bsams nas /
T08D4144:211b-41: gnas zhig pa'i phyed du ma der phyin pa dang /
T08D4144:212a-0: gnas zhig pa'i phyed dum de na @212a * //
T08D4144:212a-1: chung ma bran mo zhig dang lhan cig gnas la /
T08D4144:212a-2: shin tu dman pas nyam chung ba'i bzhin dang /
T08D4144:212a-3: ras kyi dum bu dri ma can gyis sked pa'i
T08D4144:212a-4: phyogs bkab pa dri ma'i tshogs lus la gos pa
T08D4144:212a-5: mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang kyi hud 'di ci zhig yin zhes smras te /
T08D4144:212a-6: brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /
T08D4144:212a-7: rlung grang mos phog pas yun ring mo zhig nas dran pa rnyed de /
T08D4144:212a-8: de chung ma'i thad du phyin pa dang 'di ci zhig yin zhes smras te /
T08D4144:212a-9: gsang mthon pos cho nges 'debs pa la zhugs so //

T08D4144:212a-16: su'i bzhin la blta bar bya /
T08D4144:212a-17: 'jig rten dman zhing gzhan pa la thugs brtse ba ni su zhig yin /

T08D4144:212a-20: su zhig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal gyi chu bo 'di las brgal bar bya /
T08D4144:212a-21: su zhig 'ongs nas dbul ba'i dgra 'di las rgyal bar bya /
T08D4144:212a-22: su zhig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i shing dbyung bar bya /
T08D4144:212a-23: su zhig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal gyi shing 'di rtsa ba nas gdon par bya /
T08D4144:212a-24: su zhig 'ongs nas bkres pa dang skom pa'i mche
T08D4144:212a-25: ba gtsigs pa'i kha nas ha ha zhes 'jigs pa'i
T08D4144:212a-26: sgra can gyi dbul ba'i srin po chen po med

T08D4144:212a-28: su zhig 'ongs nas bkres pa dang skom pa la
T08D4144:212a-29: sogs pas rab tu 'bar ba'i me 'di gsad par
T08D4144:212a-30: bya / su zhig 'ongs nas rgud pa gso ba'i glang po che 'di gdul bar bya /
T08D4144:212a-31: su zhig 'ongs nas nga'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med
T08D4144:212a-32: pa'i dug gi mche ba dang ldan pa'i sprul chen
T08D4144:212a-34: su zhig 'ongs nas nga'i thams cad 'phrog pa'i dbul ba'i dpa' bo bzlog par bya /
T08D4144:212a-35: su zhig 'ongs nas nga'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis

T08D4144:216a-10: de nas ded dpon rna can gyis 'byor pa de la bltas nas chung ma la smras pa /

T08D4144:216a-12: de yang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te /
T08D4144:216a-13: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs
T08D4144:216a-14: de la phyag byas nas rgyan dang gos de rnams
T08D4144:216a-15: gnas zhig pa'i phyed du ma der gzhug par brtsams
T08D4144:216a-16: so // khye'u mi sdug pa de yang pha'i skyed
T08D4144:216a-17: mos tshal der zhugs nas bkres pas gdungs pa'i yid
T08D4144:216a-18: so // dang / rang nyid mchog tu gzugs ngan
T08D4144:216a-19: pas 'di ltar yang dang yang du mya ngan byed
T08D4144:216a-20: so // dang / cing bsams pa / shin tu sdig pa'i las byed pa /
T08D4144:216a-21: mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i skal ba can shin tu gzugs ngan pa /
T08D4144:216a-22: mthong na bkra mi shis pa nga gson pas kyang dgos pa ci zhig yod de /
T08D4144:216a-23: bdag nyid kyi srog dang 'bral bar bya'o snyam nas
T08D4144:216a-24: sgyid lug pa'i yid kyis mod kho na la pa
T08D4144:216a-25: la'i shing gi yal ga'i rtser mor 'dzegs pa dang
T08D4144:216a-26: / shing gi yal ga chag nas /
T08D4144:216a-27: shing gi yal ga dang lhan cig tu lhung ste /
T08D4144:216a-29: bar skabs der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ni mi mkhyen pa'am /
T08D4144:216a-32: rnam par mi rig pa ci yang mi mnga' bas
T08D4144:216a-33: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs
T08D4144:216a-34: kyis sangs rgyas kyi lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa
T08D4144:216a-35: / mi'i las 'das pas khye'u mi sdug pa de ltar sdug bsngal ba gzigs so //
T08D4144:216a-36: gzigs nas kyang thugs rje chen pos yang dag par bskul te /
T08D4144:216a-37: skyed mos tshal der rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs nas nyid kyi sku las 'od zer 'gyed par mdzad de /
T08D4144:216a-38: bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal de yang rgyun
T08D4144:216a-39: chad par gyur nas de'i mod la langs pa dang
T08D4144:216a-40: / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
T08D4144:216b-0: gzigs @216b bskal pa bye ba brgya stong dpag tu
T08D4144:216b-1: med pa mthong ba shin tu rnyed par dka' ba
T08D4144:216b-2: / dang / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi snang
T08D4144:216b-3: bas 'bar bar byas pa'i sku dang ldan pa mthong
T08D4144:216b-4: / dang / ngo // de mthong ba'i mod la
T08D4144:216b-5: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T08D4144:216b-6: rnam par gzigs la dad pa chen po skyes te
T08D4144:216b-7: / dang / ngo // / des kyang yung bas
T08D4144:216b-8: btsos pa'i gos kyi dum bu khru gang gyon te
T08D4144:216b-9: / dang / ngo // / 'dug pa las / des dad pa'i shugs kyis lus las phud de /
T08D4144:216b-10: de dang kar ni ka'i me tog cig dad pa'i
T08D4144:216b-11: shugs chen pos 'phral du bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T08D4144:216b-12: gzigs kyi sku la gsol lo //
T08D4144:216b-13: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
T08D4144:216b-14: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
T08D4144:216b-15: ji ltar gos kyi dum bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T08D4144:216b-16: sku tshad dang ldan pa tsam du gyur nas sku
T08D4144:216b-18: me tog kar ni ka yang dbu'i steng du shing
T08D4144:216b-19: rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur nas gdugs ltar gnas
T08D4144:216b-20: pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so //
T08D4144:216b-21: de mthong ba dang khye'u mi sdug pa shin tu yang dad pa chen po skyes nas /
T08D4144:216b-22: de dad pa chen po'i shugs kyis yang dag par
T08D4144:216b-23: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs gnyis
T08D4144:216b-25: sgra gsang chen pos smon lam byed par brtsams pa /
T08D4144:216b-26: rkang gnyis mchog gyur sbyin pa 'di //
T08D4144:216b-28: de las brtsams te legs spangs nas //
T08D4144:216b-29: bdag nyid gzugs bzang nyid thob shog / gser gyi gdong can gos rnams ni //
T08D4144:216b-30: gser sbyangs lta bu gyon pa dang //
T08D4144:216b-31: bdag gis lus dang kha nas kyang //
T08D4144:216b-32: tsan dan autpal dri ltar shog / gser gyi mdog ltar snang gyur cing //
T08D4144:216b-34: nad kun las ni rnam thar cing //
T08D4144:216b-35: bstan bcos kun du pha rol phyin //
T08D4144:216b-36: kun du'ang nor dang yang dag ldan //
T08D4144:216b-37: sdug bsngal thams cad rnam spangs pa //
T08D4144:216b-38: kun mchog kun gyis lta bar 'os //
T08D4144:216b-39: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan shog / rdzogs sangs rgyas don kun grub cing //
T08D4144:216b-40: sems can rnams la mnyes gshin shog / dri med yon tan dpal ldan lha //
T08D4144:217a-0: bde zhing rdzas kun ldan par shog / des smon lam 'di byas @217a * //
T08D4144:217a-1: pa dang dus mnyam pa nyid la khye'u mi sdug pa 'phral du mi snang bar gyur cing /
T08D4144:217a-2: mdzes pa lta na sdug pa /
T08D4144:217a-3: lus kyi pags pa'i mdog gser gyi mdog can gyi gzugs bzang bar gyur to //
T08D4144:217a-4: 'phral du de la nam mkha' las gser gyi mdog
T08D4144:217a-5: can gyi gos byung bas lus la bkab cing rin
T08D4144:217a-7: rna cha la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi khyad par rnams byung bas brgyan to //
T08D4144:217a-8: lha rnams kyis kyang me tog kar ni ka dang /
T08D4144:217a-13: man d'a ra ba la sogs pa me tog gi char chen po phab pa dang /
T08D4144:217a-17: ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i char phab cing 'di skad ces kyang smras so //
T08D4144:217a-18: ae ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa la bskrun pa'i sbyin
T08D4144:217a-19: pa'i sa bon khyad par can gyi myu gu yang
T08D4144:217a-22: phye ma'i char yang pus mo nub pa tsam du
T08D4144:217a-23: skyed mos tshal de thams cad du bab nas gnas
T08D4144:217a-24: so // de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T08D4144:217a-25: rgyas rnam par gzigs skyed mos tshal de nas mngon
T08D4144:217a-26: par phyung ste mnyan ldan gyi skyed mos tshal du
T08D4144:217a-27: so // gshegs so // ded dpon rna can gyis chung ma la smras pa /
T08D4144:217a-28: bzang mo gang zhig skyes nas de las 'di lta
T08D4144:217a-29: bu'i rgud pa byung bar gyur pa'i bu de gar
T08D4144:217a-31: des skyed mos tshal du 'gro'o zhes zer ro //
T08D4144:217a-33: des de nyid du yi mug pas bdag nyid gsod
T08D4144:217a-34: par 'gyur gyi de myur du bzhud cig / ded
T08D4144:217a-35: dpon rna can gyis smras pa /
T08D4144:217a-36: yu bu'i bu'i ming ni ci //
T08D4144:217a-37: gzugs ni ci lta bu zhig yod //
T08D4144:217a-39: rje'i sras shin tu blta na mi sdug pas mi sdug pa zhes bgyi'o //
T08D4144:217a-40: de nas ded dpon rna can de shin tu myur
T08D4144:217a-41: ba'i gom stabs kyis skyed mos tshal der song ba
T08D4144:217a-42: dang / gzhon nu mi sdug pa lus gser gyi
T08D4144:217a-43: mdog can rin po che'i gos ser po phra ba
T08D4144:217a-45: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T08D4144:217a-47: lha'i bu gzhon nu bzhin du dpal gyi mchog tu 'bar ba mthong ngo //
T08D4144:217a-48: mthong nas kyang ae ma'o gang la 'di lta bu'i
T08D4144:217a-49: bu yod pa de ni skyes bu skal ba dang
T08D4144:217b-0: ldan pa'o zhes zer zhing gzhon @217b nu la smras
T08D4144:217b-1: pa / khye'u khyod su'i bu yin /
T08D4144:217b-3: rna can zhes bya ba'i ded dpon zhig yod de /
T08D4144:217b-4: nga ni de'i bu yin no //
T08D4144:217b-5: ded dpon rna can gyis bsams pa la /
T08D4144:217b-6: gzhon nu 'dis ni nga la bstings so snyam du sems shing /
T08D4144:217b-7: shin tu ltad mo skyes te /
T08D4144:217b-8: mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing gzhon nu de la yang smras pa /
T08D4144:217b-9: kye gzhon nu su'i bu yin pa bden par smros shig / mi sdug pas smras pa /
T08D4144:217b-10: 'dir ci zhig brtag par bya ste /
T08D4144:217b-11: nga ni bden pa nyid du ded dpon rna can gyi bu yin no //
T08D4144:217b-13: ae ma'o gzhon nu 'dis ni nga la shin tu yang bstings so snyam nas smras pa /
T08D4144:217b-14: gzhon nu ngas ni shin tu mi sdug go zhes thos na /
T08D4144:217b-16: de thabs gang gis gzugs bzang bar gyur /
T08D4144:217b-17: gzhon nu mi sdug pas dga' bas mig gdangs te sgra gsang chen pos smras pa /
T08D4144:217b-18: deng ni dbul ba'i sdug bsngal mes //
T08D4144:217b-19: sems ni yongs su gdungs pas na //
T08D4144:217b-20: shing gi yal ga'i rtser 'dzegs te /
T08D4144:217b-21: bdag gis rang nyid ltung bar byas //
T08D4144:217b-22: lhung bas yan lag snad pas gzir //
T08D4144:217b-23: bdag ni ba rgyal ba nyid du gyur //
T08D4144:217b-24: sems ni dbugs med ma thon par //
T08D4144:217b-25: skad cig tsam zhig rnam par gnas //

T08D4144:217b-27: sems can rnams la rjes brtse ba //

T08D4144:217b-29: skyed mos tshal ni 'dir byon to //

T08D4144:217b-31: pags pa gser ni sbyangs pa 'dra //
T08D4144:217b-33: phyogs bcu dag ni 'gengs par mdzad //
T08D4144:217b-34: de sku'i 'od zer rab bsil bas //
T08D4144:217b-35: bdag la reg pa tsam gyis na //
T08D4144:217b-36: mnyam med bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis ni //
T08D4144:217b-37: 'di dag thams cad tshim par mdzad //
T08D4144:217b-38: bkres skom ltung ba'i sdug bsngal dang //
T08D4144:217b-39: ma lus bdag gi bkra mi shis //
T08D4144:217b-40: de yi mod la zhi gyur cing //
T08D4144:217b-41: bdag ni sems can rnyed par gyur //
T08D4144:217b-42: 'di ci yin zhes spro bcas par //
T08D4144:217b-43: bdag langs de tshe thub pa yi //
T08D4144:217b-44: shin tu mdangs bzangs 'gro ba yi //
T08D4144:217b-45: phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas gyur mthong //
T08D4144:217b-46: bdag gis blta bya'i rin chen de //
T08D4144:217b-47: mgon po dpal gyi mchog gis ni //
T08D4144:218a-1: rnams rgyas par gsal mdzad pa //
T08D4144:218a-2: mthong nas bdag sngar dad par gyur //
T08D4144:218a-3: de nas rab dga'i sems kyis su //
T08D4144:218a-4: bdag gis gos kyi dum bu ni //
T08D4144:218a-5: yung bas btsos pa de nyid la //
T08D4144:218a-6: mchog tu dga' bas phul bar gyur //
T08D4144:218a-7: kar ni ka yi me tog gcig /
T08D4144:218a-8: bdag gis brtul zhugs bzang de la //
T08D4144:218a-9: gtor ba de yang thub pa yi //
T08D4144:218a-10: steng du gdugs bzhin gnas par gyur //
T08D4144:218a-11: des na dga' zhing mgu ba yis //
T08D4144:218a-12: zhabs gnyis la ni rab btud de //
T08D4144:218a-13: shin tu dang ba bskyed pa yis //
T08D4144:218a-14: bdag gis smon lam 'di byas so //
T08D4144:218a-15: mgon po sbyin pa 'di yis ni //
T08D4144:218a-16: de nyid bdag ni gzugs ngan pa //
T08D4144:218a-17: yongs su spangs shing gzugs bzang ba'ang //
T08D4144:218a-18: srid pa'i rgya mtsho thob par shog / gser gyi mdog can gos rnams kyang //
T08D4144:218a-19: gser sbyangs lta bu gyon pa dang //
T08D4144:218a-20: bdag gi lus dang kha dog kyang //
T08D4144:218a-21: tsan dan autpal dri ldan shog / bdag gi smon lam de dag ni //
T08D4144:218a-22: 'dis ni byas par gyur pa na //
T08D4144:218a-24: yid du 'ong ba byung bar gyur //
T08D4144:218a-25: gos ni rin thang cher gyur pa //
T08D4144:218a-26: ser zhing shin tu 'jam pa dang //
T08D4144:218a-27: bdag gi lus la 'phral du ni //
T08D4144:218a-28: skad cig de nyid dag las byung //
T08D4144:218a-29: nam mkha'i ngos nas lha rnams kyis //
T08D4144:218a-30: me tog dang ni tsan dan dang //
T08D4144:218a-31: aa ga ru dang ta ma la //
T08D4144:218a-32: aa ga ru sogs char 'di phab //
T08D4144:218a-33: ca co rnam pa chen po dang //
T08D4144:218a-34: yid 'phrog pa yi rnga brdung zhing //
T08D4144:218a-35: sangs rgyas bcom ldan phyag 'tshal zhes //
T08D4144:218a-36: bya ba'i sgra ni smra bar gyur //
T08D4144:218a-37: deng ni dge ba 'di byas pas //
T08D4144:218a-38: bdag gi gzugs ni 'di dag dang //
T08D4144:218a-40: 'di ni byung bar gyur pa yin //
T08D4144:218a-41: de nas ded dpon rna can gyis de skad thos pa dang /
T08D4144:218a-42: 'phral du dad pa'i shugs kyis ba spu'i bu ga
T08D4144:218a-43: thams cad ldang bar gyur cing de bzhin gshegs pa
T08D4144:218a-44: rnam par gzigs la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal
T08D4144:218a-45: zhing mchog tu yid dga' ba skyes pa dang /
T08D4144:218a-46: bu gzugs bzang ba la mig mi 'dzums pas bltas te smras pa /
T08D4144:218a-48: de nas gzhon nu gzugs bzang kyis bdag ni pha
T08D4144:218a-49: 'di las skyes pa yin no snyam nas shin tu
T08D4144:218b-0: gus pa dang bcas @218b pas pha'i rkang pa la
T08D4144:218b-1: phyag byas nas yab legs par byon tam zhes smras
T08D4144:218b-2: te / pha dang lhan cig khyim du chas so //
T08D4144:218b-3: de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i shes pas
T08D4144:218b-4: 'og tu 'jug par 'gyur ba yin pas de 'di
T08D4144:218b-6: ded dpon rna can 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin no//
T08D4144:218b-7: de rtsva khyim na gnas pa ni regs pa ma
T08D4144:218b-8: yin no snyam nas lha'i bu las sna tshogs pa
T08D4144:218b-9: la smras pa / las sna tshogs pa song la
T08D4144:218b-10: ded dpon rna can gyi khang pa rin po che
T08D4144:218b-11: sna bzhi las gru bzhi pa'i rnam pa gyis shig
T08D4144:218b-12: / de nas las rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgya
T08D4144:218b-14: skad cig de nyid la rgyal po'i pho brang mnyan
T08D4144:218b-15: ldan du 'ongs nas rin po che sna bzhi'i pha
T08D4144:218b-16: gu las brtsigs shing ka bas bteg pa /
T08D4144:218b-17: khyams mtho zhing mdzes pa dang /
T08D4144:218b-20: ngos na lcog gis legs par bkod pa'i yan lag can dang /
T08D4144:218b-21: gdung phran la spang leb legs par bkod pa /
T08D4144:218b-22: shin tu mtho ba'i khang pa zur bzhi pa /
T08D4144:218b-23: shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i rta babs kyis sgo nye bar mdzes pa dang /
T08D4144:218b-24: ston ka'i sprin mdzes pa dang /
T08D4144:218b-27: padma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba /
T08D4144:218b-30: mu tig gi chun 'phyang dang gos kyi chun 'phyang gi tshogs btags pa /
T08D4144:218b-31: grong khyer gyi mchog ma lus pa nye bar mdzes par byed pa'i gnas su gyur pa /
T08D4144:218b-32: shin tu 'bar ba'i gser gyi rang bzhin can gsar
T08D4144:218b-33: du mngon par 'byung ba'i aa nu'i rgyan byas shing
T08D4144:218b-34: yan lag brgyad pa'i chus yongs su gang ba'i bu
T08D4144:218b-35: ma pa brgyad kyis sgo nye bar gnas par byas
T08D4144:218b-36: pa / dpag tu med pa'i dngul dang /
T08D4144:218b-41: mthon ka chen po la sogs pa'i rin po che rnams kyis yongs su skor ba /
T08D4144:218b-42: gter du mas yongs su khengs pa /
T08D4144:218b-44: yo byad kyis yongs su gang ba'i khang pa'i mchog cig byas so //
T08D4144:218b-45: de nas ded dpon rna can gyis khyim du 'ongs pa dang /
T08D4144:218b-46: de'i chung ma dga' zhing mgu la rangs pas /
T08D4144:218b-47: gser gyi ril ba las chu byin te smras pa /
T08D4144:218b-48: rje'i sras khyed kyi bsod nams kyi mthus 'ga' zhig gis 'di lta bu'i khang pa'i mchog byas so //
T08D4144:219a-1: ded dpon rna can gzhal yas khang de la mngon par lta zhing /
T08D4144:219a-2: mchog tu dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas /
T08D4144:219a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la shin tu yang dad pa skyes te /
T08D4144:219a-4: ba spu ldang ba dang thal mo spyi bor sbyar te /
T08D4144:219a-5: de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
T08D4144:219a-6: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsam gyis
T08D4144:219a-7: mi khyab pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po

T08D4144:219a-9: phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras te phyag byas nas rab

T08D4144:219a-13: gang du bdag gis sa bon btab //
T08D4144:219a-14: 'bras bu de nyid stsol bar mdzad //
T08D4144:219a-15: sbyin pa ngan ngon de tsam ni //
T08D4144:219a-16: legs par sbyar ba kun bral gang //
T08D4144:219a-17: nyams dga' mthong ba'i gser dang ni //
T08D4144:219a-18: rin chen rang bzhin khyim 'di gang //
T08D4144:219a-19: rtsig pa'i lhag ma lus pa tsam //
T08D4144:219a-20: bdag khyim mya ngan 'phel byed pa'i //
T08D4144:219a-21: sprin dang nges par bral ba yi //
T08D4144:219a-23: byi ba 'bus rtol bu ga yi //
T08D4144:219a-24: skar khung ldan pa'i khyim yang gang //
T08D4144:219a-25: rin chen rab mchog du ma yi //
T08D4144:219a-26: skar khung ldan pa'i khyim 'di gang //
T08D4144:219a-27: khros pa'i khyim khyab tsher ma dang //
T08D4144:219a-28: mi gtsang tshogs kyis gzings de gang //
T08D4144:219a-30: rin chen bsags 'di gang yin mtshar //
T08D4144:219a-31: sbrul gyis bor ba'i lpags rnying 'di //
T08D4144:219a-32: 'phyang ba'i gos kyis khyab de gang //
T08D4144:219a-33: phra ba'i gos ni phun tshogs bkra //
T08D4144:219a-35: khyi mos bsdus pa'i rus gong ni //
T08D4144:219a-36: dkar pos gcal bkram khyim de gang /
T08D4144:219a-37: dri zhim me tog bzang po 'di //
T08D4144:219a-38: sil mas nye bar mdzes 'di gang //
T08D4144:219a-39: mya ngan 'chi ma'i rgyun gyis ni //
T08D4144:219a-40: rtag tu brlan pa'i khyim de gang //
T08D4144:219a-41: dri zhim gla rtsi tsan dan gyi //
T08D4144:219a-42: chu yis chag chag btab 'di gang //
T08D4144:219a-43: me lces tshig cing khva rnams kyis //
T08D4144:219a-44: mi rnams rta babs can de gang//
T08D4144:219a-45: gser dang rin chen mu tig mchog / phreng bas nye bar mdzes 'di gang //
T08D4144:219a-46: spang leb chag pa'i sgo yis ni //
T08D4144:219a-47: bsgribs pa yi ni khyim 'di gang //
T08D4144:219a-48: shel las bsgrubs pa'i sgo glegs ni //
T08D4144:219a-50: nga ni yun ring nyams pa yi //
T08D4144:219a-51: 'jig du ma byed pa'i khyim 'di gang //
T08D4144:219b-0: nor @219b bu'i rang bzhin ka ba dang //
T08D4144:219b-1: sgo gang gis ni brgyan 'di gang //
T08D4144:219b-2: smre sngags sgra yis kun du ni //
T08D4144:219b-3: khyab pa'i bzhi mdo de ni gang //
T08D4144:219b-4: rol mo'i sgra dang gling bu yi //
T08D4144:219b-5: skad dang yang dag ldan ni gang //
T08D4144:219b-6: sngon ni thod pa'i tshogs dang ni //
T08D4144:219b-7: phyag dar phung pos khems te gang //
T08D4144:219b-8: rin chen phung pos mdzes pa gang /
T08D4144:219b-9: gang du bsags pa 'di ni gang //
T08D4144:219b-10: lcog dang gdung phran bkod pa rnams //
T08D4144:219b-11: ma lus lhag par gyur te gang //
T08D4144:219b-12: nang na mthon ka chen po dang //
T08D4144:219b-13: shel ni chen po bzhag 'di gang //
T08D4144:219b-14: stan dang bral ba'i so phag ni //
T08D4144:219b-15: gcig la brten par gyur de gang //
T08D4144:219b-16: sna tshogs gos g-yogs nang tshangs can //
T08D4144:219b-17: brgya phrag dang ni ldan de gang //
T08D4144:219b-18: sngon ni gsegs mas khyab gyur pa'i //
T08D4144:219b-19: sa yi cha yi mal de gang //
T08D4144:219b-20: rgya chen dang ldan dpal gyi khri //
T08D4144:219b-21: nyams su dga' ba 'di ni gang //
T08D4144:219b-22: rtsvas g-yogs pa yi mal stan ni //
T08D4144:219b-23: bdag la rab tu rtsub ste gang //
T08D4144:219b-24: shing bal yang zhing 'jam pa'i stan //
T08D4144:219b-25: deng rab yid du 'ong ba gang //
T08D4144:219b-26: khyim nas khyi yis gang gyur pas //
T08D4144:219b-27: shin tu dri mi zhim de gang //
T08D4144:219b-28: gzhal yas khang na yid 'ong ba //
T08D4144:219b-29: dri zhim dam pas bsgos 'di gang //
T08D4144:219b-30: sngon chad khang pa'i phyi nang na //
T08D4144:219b-31: gos dengs snal mas khyab de gang //
T08D4144:219b-32: sna tshogs rin chen mchog gyur pas //
T08D4144:219b-33: rnam spras nyams dga' 'di ni gang //
T08D4144:219b-34: khra yis mi gtsang ri mo yis //
T08D4144:219b-35: dkar po brgya rab 'chang de gang //
T08D4144:219b-36: rgyan rnams sna tshogs mu tig gis //
T08D4144:219b-37: dra bas nye bar mdzes 'di gang //
T08D4144:219b-38: sdug bsngal tshig smre lag pa dag / bsgreng ba'i khang pa de ni gang //
T08D4144:219b-39: dri med gdugs dang ba dan dag / bsgrengs pas brgyan par gyur 'di gang //
T08D4144:219b-40: skyob pa bsod nams zhing gyur pa //
T08D4144:219b-41: gang zhig byon pas bdag deng nyid //
T08D4144:219b-42: dbul ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba //
T08D4144:219b-43: mgon po de la phyag 'tshal lo //

T08D4144:219b-46: thams cad mkhyen pa rnam par gzigs //
T08D4144:219b-48: rnam par rgyal bzhin bsam yas pa'i //

T08D4144:219b-51: gzhal yas khang mchog thob par mdzad //

T08D4144:220a-5: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal can gyur nas //

T08D4144:220a-7: nor che ba dang ldan par gyur //
T08D4144:220a-8: sa bon de nyid btab tsam gyis //
T08D4144:220a-10: 'jig rten mchog gyur khyab bdag de //
T08D4144:220a-11: su zhig gis ni mchog 'os min //

T08D4144:220a-14: ngal 'byon pa 'di lta bu thob par mdzad pa yin pas /

T08D4144:220a-18: gus pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs /
T08D4144:220a-19: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /

T08D4144:220a-22: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas par gyur to //

T08D4144:220a-24: rje bos 'bras chan gyi thum bu zhig byin pa dang /
T08D4144:220a-25: de thogs te zhing las la chas pa dang /

T08D4144:220a-27: ded dpon rna can gyis ma sha'i snum khur gcig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul bas /
T08D4144:220a-28: 'byor ba 'di lta bu thob ces thos so //
T08D4144:220a-30: skyes bu des dge bsnyen de la smras pa /

T08D4144:220b-28: chos yang dag par mdzad pa /
T08D4144:220b-29: ngan pa las 'pho bar mdzad pa /
T08D4144:220b-30: lam bzang po ston par mdzad pa /
T08D4144:220b-31: the tshom gcod par mdzad pa /
T08D4144:220b-32: bden pa yang dag par ston par mdzad pa /
T08D4144:220b-33: nyon mongs pa zhi bar mdzad pa /
T08D4144:220b-35: 'jig rten rnams sgrol bar mdzad pa /

T08D4144:220b-58: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i dgongs pa can /
T08D4144:220b-59: sdig pa rnams las grol ba /
T08D4144:220b-60: lhag par mos pa dang ldan pa /

T08D4144:221a-7: nyon mongs pa'i dgra las nges par rgyal ba /
T08D4144:221a-9: mi bskyod pa'i chos dang ldan pa /

T08D4144:221a-36: bdag gi sha dron po bcad nas brgya byin khra'i gzugs can la sogs pa dang /
T08D4144:221a-37: sems can thams cad la thabs thams cad kyis phan bar dgongs pa /

T08D4144:221a-51: shes rab la sogs pa'i yon tan sku tshe brgya
T08D4144:221a-52: stong du mar bsags pas zhi ba'i byang chub kyi
T08D4144:221a-53: mchog bla na med pa brnyes pa'o //

T08D4144:221b-9: klu'i dbang po rnams kyis mos pas rab tu dang ba dang /

T08D4144:222a-3: nas / skad cig de nyid la ded dpon ded
T08D4144:222a-4: bul ba med par gyur cig ces de ltar sems
T08D4144:222a-5: kyi nor bu rin po cher gyur pa de bzhin
T08D4144:222a-7: shin tu zhan pa la longs spyod kyi rgyur gyur pa'i smon la ma btab pa yin la /
T08D4144:222a-8: nga yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
T08D4144:222a-9: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal
T08D4144:222a-10: pa bye ba brgya stong dpag tu med par yang
T08D4144:222a-11: mi mthong ba / shin tu blta bar 'os pa /

T08D4144:222a-13: med par sems can thams cad kyi don la zhugs

T08D4144:222a-15: rje chen po las mi ldog pa /
