T08D4144:222a-17: sbrul chen pos zin pa'i dman pa rnams la rjes
T08D4144:222a-19: rnam par ltung pa'i 'gro ba rnams la khyad par

T08D4144:222a-22: ngas zhing las kyis bsgrubs pa'i 'bras chan gyi slong
T08D4144:222a-23: mo shin tu zhan pa rnyed pa 'di phul la

T08D4144:222a-26: tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i smon lam gdab par

T08D4144:222a-28: la bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T08D4144:222a-29: rgyas rnam pa gzigs kyis sems dang sems kyi rtogs
T08D4144:222a-30: pa mkhyen nas rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs te de'i mdun
T08D4144:222a-31: du bzhugs so // las byed pa'i skyes bu des
T08D4144:222a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs sku blta bas
T08D4144:222a-34: gser shin tu sbyangs pa ltar mngon par mdzes pa'i
T08D4144:222a-35: mdangs dang ldan pa'i lha'i ri'i rtse mo la nyi
T08D4144:222a-36: ma 'char ka'i 'od zer rnam par 'byung bas mtshams
T08D4144:222a-37: snang bar byas pas shin tu gsal bar byas pa
T08D4144:222a-38: lta bu'i sku la 'od dang ldan pa mthong ngo
T08D4144:222a-39: // mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba dang yid
T08D4144:222a-40: bde ba skyes nas dad pa'i shugs chen pos 'bras
T08D4144:222a-42: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

T08D4144:222b-9: chos rnams ji ltar ston mdzad pa //
T08D4144:222b-10: brnyes pa de bzhin bdag kyang ni //
T08D4144:222b-11: kun mkhyen nyid ni thob par shog / ji ltar khyed bdud las rgyal zhing //
T08D4144:222b-12: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa //
T08D4144:222b-13: de bzhin bdag kyang nges rgyal nas //
T08D4144:222b-14: chos kyis 'khor lo bskor gyur cig / ji ltar mgon pos 'khor ba yi //
T08D4144:222b-15: rgya mtsho'i ngogs su sgrol mdzad bzhin //
T08D4144:222b-16: thub pa'i dam pa de ltar ni //
T08D4144:222b-17: bdag gis sems can mang dgrol bgyi //

T08D4144:226a-7: gos dbul bar bya'o snyam du dgongs na bcom ldan
T08D4144:226a-8: 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas /
T08D4144:226a-9: da ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa
T08D4144:226a-10: dge slong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la
T08D4144:226a-12: gnas brtan kun dga' bos bka' stsal pa /
T08D4144:226a-13: ded dpon de bzhin du gyis shig / ngas ji
T08D4144:226a-14: ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
T08D4144:226a-15: 'dzam bu'i gling na ji snyed cig gnas pa thams
T08D4144:226a-16: cad 'dir 'du bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o //
T08D4144:226a-17: de nas ded dpon nyi ma rab tu dga' bas rgyas pa'i yid dang /
T08D4144:226a-18: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi phyi rol 'du
T08D4144:226a-19: ba'i gnas rdo dang gyo mo dang gseg ma bsal
T08D4144:226a-20: te / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab nas gdugs dang /
T08D4144:226a-25: me tog sna tshogs kyi gcal bkram pa dang /
T08D4144:226a-26: spos dri zhim po'i spos snod nye bar bkram pa dang /
T08D4144:226a-27: shin tu mdzes pa'i bla re dang /
T08D4144:226a-28: rta babs bres pas shin tu nyams dga' ba byed du bcug ste /
T08D4144:226a-29: de nyid kyi mtshan mo gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' pa dang bca' ba rnams g-yos te /
T08D4144:226a-30: nang par snga ba nyid du langs nas gdan bshams te /
T08D4144:226a-32: gnas brtan kun dga' bo la pho nyas dus la bab par gsol pa /
T08D4144:226a-34: bca' ba rnams sta gon bgyis lags te /
T08D4144:226a-35: da de dus la bab pa lags par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol /
T08D4144:226a-36: de nas gnas brtan kun dga' bo rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phags te /
T08D4144:226a-37: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di ma lus par gser bcom lta
T08D4144:226a-38: bu'i mdog gis kun du snang bar mdzad nas rang
T08D4144:226a-40: chu dang bcas pa'i sprin gyis 'brug sgra bzhin du zab cing gsal ba'i skad kyis sgra bsgrags pa /
T08D4144:226a-41: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos las gang rdzu 'phrul
T08D4144:226a-42: thob pa rnams ni rang nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis
T08D4144:226a-43: shog shig / gang dag so so'i skye bo rnams
T08D4144:226b-0: ni nga'i rdzu 'phrul @226b gyis shog shig / de
T08D4144:226b-1: nas ghand'i de thos pas kha ba can dang /
T08D4144:226b-2: 'bigs byed dang ma la ya dang /
T08D4144:226b-3: ba ri ya tra dang spos gyi ngad ldang dang /
T08D4144:226b-4: ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /
T08D4144:226b-11: mu khyud 'dzin la sogs pa nags tshal dang /
T08D4144:226b-16: gtsug lag khang rnams na gang dag gnas pa dang /
T08D4144:226b-19: dur khrod la sogs pa na dge slong gang zhig
T08D4144:226b-20: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing bde ba
T08D4144:226b-21: thob nas rab tu gnas pa rnams skad cig ma
T08D4144:226b-22: de la de dag thams cad nam mkha'i ngos nas
T08D4144:226b-26: dus mtshams kyi sprin dri ma med pas nam mkha' khebs pa de lta bur byas te /
T08D4144:226b-27: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du lhags nas 'du ba'i gnas der 'tshogs te /
T08D4144:226b-28: skad cig ma de nyid la dge slong bye ba phrag gsum yang dag par 'dus par gyur te /
T08D4144:226b-29: bye ba gcig ni zag pa zad pa rnams so //
T08D4144:226b-30: gnyis pa ni bslab pa la zhugs pa rnams so //
T08D4144:226b-31: gsum pa ni so so'i skye bo dge ba can rnams te /
T08D4144:226b-32: de nas rgan pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so //
T08D4144:226b-33: de nas ded dpon nyi mas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la sogs pa /
T08D4144:226b-34: dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar gshegs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
T08D4144:226b-35: btung ba rnams rang gi lag nas kun du tshim par bstabs te /
T08D4144:226b-36: ji srid dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis longs spyad par rig nas /
T08D4144:226b-37: byag bcabs shing lhung bzed bsdus nas chos gos gsum
T08D4144:226b-38: po brgya stong du ma gsol bar 'dod nas dge
T08D4144:226b-39: slong dang dge 'dun de rnams la bltas pa dang
T08D4144:226b-40: / yid shin tu dga' ba skyes par gyur to //
T08D4144:226b-41: dge slong gser mdog gis bsam pa shes nas smras pa /
T08D4144:226b-42: yab khyed thugs las chung bar mdzod cig / bdag
T08D4144:226b-43: nyid kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun la gser gyi
T08D4144:226b-44: mdog can gyi chos gos gsum gsum dbul bar bgyi'o
T08D4144:226b-45: // de nas dge slong gser mdog gi rang gi
T08D4144:226b-46: lus las gser gyi mdog can gyi gos phud cig
T08D4144:226b-47: phud cing srang 'bum ri ba'i chos gos gsum gsum
T08D4144:226b-48: dge slong bye ba phrag gsum la rgan pa'i rim
T08D4144:227a-1: bar skabs der lha brgya stong du mas ca co'i
T08D4144:227a-2: sgra sgrogs shing rol mo sna tshogs yang dag par
T08D4144:227a-3: rdung ba dang / lha'i me tog dang /
T08D4144:227a-5: gos kyi char phab par gyur to //
T08D4144:227a-6: ji ltar phyogs der phyogs sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams dang /
T08D4144:227a-7: rgyal po ma skyes dgra btsun mo dang /
T08D4144:227a-11: skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa de rnams kyis rnam
T08D4144:227a-12: pa de lta bu'i ngo mtshar la bltas nas rmad
T08D4144:227a-13: du byung nas mig gdangs te /
T08D4144:227a-14: lan gsum gyi bar du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de /
T08D4144:227a-15: ae ma'o bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa /
T08D4144:227a-16: ae ma'o bsod nams kyi stobs /
T08D4144:227a-17: ae ma'o sbyin gnas kyi zhing la sbyin pa'i sa
T08D4144:227a-18: bon btab pa'i rnam par smin par gda' bar mi
T08D4144:227a-20: mkhas pa su zhig gis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i
T08D4144:227a-21: bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa yang
T08D4144:227a-23: sbyin pa'i zhing la su zhig sbyin par mi byed ces zer zhing /
T08D4144:227a-24: de ltar srog chags brgya stong du ma rnams thal mo sbyar te /
T08D4144:227a-25: sgra gsang mthon pos sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal zhes zer bar gyur to //
T08D4144:227a-26: de nas gnas brtan kun dga' bos sbyin pa'i rab bton pa mdzad do //
T08D4144:227a-27: de nas ded dpon nyi ma stan las langs nye bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
T08D4144:227a-28: pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te /
T08D4144:227a-29: gnas brtan kun dga' bo gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te /
T08D4144:227a-30: phyag byas nas lan gsum gyi bar du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de /
T08D4144:227a-31: btsun pa gang bdag cag la 'phags pa kun dga' bos mdzad pa 'di ni mas kyang ma bgyis /
T08D4144:227a-34: lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis /
T08D4144:227a-35: nang mi dang nye du'i tshogs yid du 'ong bas kyang ma bgyis /
T08D4144:227a-36: sngon gums pa rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis te /
T08D4144:227a-37: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho skams pa nas //
T08D4144:227a-38: lha dang lha min rnams kyis mchod gyur cing //
T08D4144:227a-39: skye ba rga shi'i skyon dang rnam bral bas //
T08D4144:227a-40: srid pa brgya stong dag na mthong dga' ba //
T08D4144:227a-41: thub pa khyod ma thong deng bdag 'bras ldan gyur //
T08D4144:227a-42: de nas gnas brtan kun dga' bos rgyal po dang
T08D4144:227a-43: bcas pa'i 'khor de rnams chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
T08D4144:227b-0: yang dag par @227b bstan pa dang /
T08D4144:227b-1: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad pa dang /
T08D4144:227b-2: yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /
T08D4144:227b-3: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas lha brgya stong de dag dang /
T08D4144:227b-4: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong
T08D4144:227b-5: gis phyag byas nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so
T08D4144:227b-6: // de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
T08D4144:227b-7: ni bya ba cung zad cig byas na yang 'bras
T08D4144:227b-8: bu chen por 'gyur ba yin no //
T08D4144:227b-9: gser mdog gi rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so /
T08D4144:227b-11: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma shr'i bha dra dang /
T08D4144:227b-12: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen
